                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <div class="col-md-6 col-xs-12">
                            <button id="btn_update" type="button" class="btn btn-primary pull-right"
                                data-dismiss="modal">Add Notes</button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </form>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-default" data-dismiss="modal">Close</button>
            </div>
        </div>

    </div>
</div>

<!-- Modal -->
<div id="myModal" class="modal fade" role="dialog">
    <div class="modal-dialog">

        <!-- Modal content-->
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</button>
                <h4 class="modal-title">Add new Topic</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                <input type="text" id="addtopic">
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="myFunction()" data-dismiss="modal">Add</button>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-default" data-dismiss="modal">Close</button>
            </div>
        </div>

    </div>
</div>

<!-- Modal -->
<div id="myModal2" class="modal fade" role="dialog">
    <div class="modal-dialog">

        <!-- Modal content-->
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</button>
                <h4 class="modal-title">Add new Topic</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                <input type="text" id="addtopics">
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="myFunctions()" data-dismiss="modal">Add</button>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-default" data-dismiss="modal">Close</button>
            </div>
        </div>

    </div>
</div>
<style>
    .hisTopic {
        text-transform: capitalize;
    }

    .scroll_div {
        width: 100%;
        height: auto;
        max-height: 300px;
        overflow-y: scroll;
    }
</style>

<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $("#addHistory").click(function () {
            var cid = $(this).attr('data-id');
            var topic = $("#ddlHistoryTopic").val();
            var notes = $("#historyNotes").val();
            var date = $("#date_history").val();

            if (topic == "") {
                alert("Please select topic.");
                $("#ddlHistoryTopic").focus();
                return false;
            } else if ($.trim(notes) == "") {
                alert("Please enter notes.");
                $("#historyNotes").focus();
                return false;
            }
            else {
                $.ajax({
                    url: home_url + "yogiccoach/add_history_notes",
                    data: { "cid": cid, "topic": topic, "notes": notes, "date": date },
                    dataType: "json",
                    type: "POST",
                    success: function (response) {
                        if (response.status == '1') {
                            $("#historyNotes").val("");
                            $("#historyNotes").focus();
                            $("#tbHistoryNotes").html(response.data);

                        } else {
                            alert(response.message);
                        }
                    }
                });

            }

        });
    });
</script>
<script>

    function myFunction() {
        var x = document.getElementById("ddlHistoryTopic");
        var option = document.createElement("option");
        if (document.getElementById("addtopic").value != "") {
            option.text = document.getElementById("addtopic").value;
            x.add(option, x[1]);
        } else {
            alert("Please insert topic");
        }
    }

    function myFunctions() {
        var x = document.getElementById("History_Topic");
        var option = document.createElement("option");
        if (document.getElementById("addtopics").value != "") {
            option.text = document.getElementById("addtopics").value;
            x.add(option, x[1]);
        } else {
            alert("Please insert topic");
        }
    }

    $(document).on('click', '.item_edit', function () {
        var topic = $(this).data('topic');
        var history_id = $(this).data('id');
        var details = $(this).data('details');
        var date = $(this).data("date");

        $('#Modal_Edit').modal('show');
        var x = document.getElementById("History_Topic");
        var option = document.createElement("option");
        option.text = topic;
        option.setAttribute('selected', true);
        option.setAttribute('data-id', history_id);
        x.add(option, x[1]);

        $('#history_Notes').val(details);
        $('#date_his').val(date);
        $('#btn_update').data("id", history_id);

    });

    //update record to database
    $('#btn_update').on('click', function () {
        var topic = $('#History_Topic').val();
        var details = $('#history_Notes').val();
        var date = $('#date_his').val();
        var history_id = $(this).data("id");
        $.ajax({
            type: "POST",
            url: home_url + "yogiccoach/edit_history_notes",
            dataType: "JSON",
            data: { topic: topic, details: details, date: date, history_id: history_id },
            success: function (data) {
                location.reload(true);
            }

        });
        location.reload(true);
        return false;
    });

    $(document).on('click', '.item_delete', function () {
        var id = $(this).data('id');
        var result = confirm("Are you sure to delete?");
        if (result) {
            $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: home_url + "yogiccoach/delete_history_notes",
                dataType: "JSON",
                data: { id: id },
                success: function (data) {
                    location.reload(true);
                }
            });
        }
        location.reload(true);
    });
</script>
<?php $this->load->view('yogiccoach/footer'); ?>

Library



library index page

tool/library/index.php 
<?php  
$conn = new mysqli("localhost" , "myporta7_AppLive", "100%dev100", "myporta7_YogaPortal");
$image='';
$userRow='';
      $user_id=$_GET['user_id'];
      $sql = "SELECT * FROM mys_users WHERE fld_id = '$user_id'";
      $result = $conn->query($sql);

if ($result->num_rows > 0) {
  // output data of each row
  while($userRow = $result->fetch_assoc()) {
    $image_path=($userRow['fld_file_name']!='')?$userRow['fld_file_name']:'assets/uploads/member/'.'default.jpg';
           $image = "https://www.myportalx.com/tool/".$image_path;

           $timezone = $userRow['fld_timezone'];
  }
  date_default_timezone_set($timezone);
}
?>
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
    <!-- META SECTION -->
    <title> Yogic Teacher Dashboard</title>
    <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
    <link rel="icon" href="assets/new_client_dashboard/images/Myportalx logo 2.png" type="image/x-icon" />
    <!-- END META SECTION -->
    <link href="../assets/css/newfoldercss/docs.min.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
    <!--<link href="<?php //echo base_url()."assets/";?>css/newfoldercss/tcscrolling.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />-->
    <link href="../assets/css/newfoldercss/glasscase.minf195.css?v=2.1" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />

    <!-- CSS INCLUDE -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" id="theme" href="../assets/css/theme-default.css" />

    <script src="../assets/js/fast-buddy.js?3"></script>

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.6/css/bootstrap.min.css" />
    <script src="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.7/js/bootstrap.min.js"></script>
    <style>
        .my-custom-scrollbar {
            position: relative;
            height: 200px;
            overflow: auto;
        }

        .table-wrapper-scroll-y {
            display: block;
        }
    </style>
</head>

                    <ul>
                        <li><a href="https://www.myportalx.com/tool/yogiccoach/appointment_calendar">Calendar</a></li>

                <li><a href="https://www.myportalx.com/tool/yogiccoach/payments"><span
                            class="xn-text">Payment</span></a></li>
                <li><a href="https://www.myportalx.com/tool/yogiccoach/reports"><span class="xn-text">Reports</span></a>
                </li>
                <li><a href="https://www.myportalx.com/tool/site/pages?id=<?= $user_id ?>">Site Creator</a></li>
                <li><a href="https://www.myportalx.com/tool/yogiccoach/artical">Post Article</a></li>
                <li><a href="https://www.myportalx.com/tool/yogiccoach/setting_edit_profile"><span
                            class="xn-text">Profile</span></a></li>
            </ul>
            <!-- END X-NAVIGATION -->
        </div>
        <!-- END PAGE SIDEBAR -->
        <!-- PAGE CONTENT -->
        <div class="page-content">
            <!-- START X-NAVIGATION VERTICAL -->
            <ul class="x-navigation x-navigation-horizontal x-navigation-panel">
                <li class="pull-left" style="padding:15px 10px;">Your Time:
                    <?php echo date("m-d-Y H:i:s A T");?>
                </li>
                <li class="xn-icon-button pull-right last">
                    <a href="#" class="mb-control" data-box="#mb-signout"><span class="fa fa-power-off"></span></a>
                </li>
                <li class="xn-icon-button pull-right">
                    <a href="https://www.myportalx.com/tool/yogiccoach"><span class="fa fa-home fa-fw"></span></a>
                </li>
            </ul>
            <!-- END X-NAVIGATION VERTICAL -->
            <input type="hidden" id="user_id" value="<?=$user_id?>"><br /><br />
            <div class="container">
                <h2 align="center">Library</a></h2><br />
                <div align="left">
                    <button type="button" name="create_folder" id="create_folder"
                        class="btn btn-success">Create</button>
                </div><br />
                <div class="table-responsive" id="folder_table"></div>
            </div>

            <div id="folderModal" class="modal fade" role="dialog">
                <div class="modal-dialog">
                    <div class="modal-content">
                        <div class="modal-header">
                            <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</button>
                            <h4 class="modal-title"><span id="change_title">Create Folder</span></h4>
                        </div>
                        <div class="modal-body">
                            <p>Enter Folder Name
                                <input type="text" name="folder_name" id="folder_name" class="form-control" />
                            </p>
                            <br />
                            <input type="hidden" name="action" id="action" />
                            <input type="hidden" name="old_name" id="old_name" />
                            <input type="button" name="folder_button" id="folder_button" class="btn btn-info"
                                value="Create" />

                        </div>
                        <div class="modal-footer">
                            <button type="button" class="btn btn-default" data-dismiss="modal">Close</button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div id="uploadModal" class="modal fade" role="dialog">
                <div class="modal-dialog">
                    <div class="modal-content">
                        <div class="modal-header">
                            <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</button>
                            <h4 class="modal-title">Upload File</h4>
                        </div>
                        <div class="modal-body">
                            <form method="post" id="upload_form" enctype='multipart/form-data'>
                                <p>Select file
                                    <input type="file" name="upload_file" />
                                </p>
                                <br />
                                <input type="hidden" name="hidden_folder_name" id="hidden_folder_name" />
                                <input type="submit" name="upload_button" class="btn btn-info" value="Upload" />
                            </form>
                        </div>
                        <div class="modal-footer">
                            <button type="button" class="btn btn-default" data-dismiss="modal">Close</button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div id="filelistModal" class="modal fade" role="dialog">
                <div class="modal-dialog">
                    <div class="modal-content">
                        <div class="modal-header">
                            <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</button>
                            <h4 class="modal-title">File List</h4>
                        </div>
                        <div class="modal-body" id="file_list">

                        </div>
                        <div class="modal-footer">
                            <button type="button" class="btn btn-default" data-dismiss="modal">Close</button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div id="ClientlistModal" class="modal fade" role="dialog">
                <div class="modal-dialog">
                    <div class="modal-content">
                        <div class="modal-header">
                            <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</button>
                            <h4 class="modal-title">Client List</h4>
                        </div>
                        <div class="modal-body" id="client_list">

                        </div>
                        <div class="modal-footer">
                            <button type="button" class="btn btn-info" data-dismiss="modal">Send</button>
                            <button type="button" class="btn btn-default" data-dismiss="modal">Close</button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</body>

</html>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {

        load_folder_list();

        function load_folder_list() {
            var action = "fetch";
            var user_id = $("#user_id").val();
            $.ajax({
                url: "action.php",
                method: "POST",
                data: { action: action, user_id: user_id },
                success: function (data) {
                    $('#folder_table').html(data);
                }
            });
        }

        $(document).on('click', '#create_folder', function () {
            $('#action').val("create");
            $('#folder_name').val('');
            $('#folder_button').val('Create');
            $('#folderModal').modal('show');
            $('#old_name').val('');
            $('#change_title').text("Create Folder");
        });

        $(document).on('click', '#folder_button', function () {
            var folder_name = $('#folder_name').val();
            var old_name = $('#old_name').val();
            var action = $('#action').val();
            var user_id = $('#user_id').val();
            if (folder_name != '') {
                $.ajax({
                    url: "action.php",
                    method: "POST",
                    data: { folder_name: folder_name, old_name: old_name, action: action, user_id: user_id },
                    success: function (data) {
                        $('#folderModal').modal('hide');
                        load_folder_list();
                        alert(data);
                    }
                });
            }
            else {
                alert("Enter Folder Name");
            }
        });

        $(document).on("click", ".update", function () {
            var folder_name = $(this).data("name");
            $('#old_name').val(folder_name);
            $('#folder_name').val(folder_name);
            $('#action').val("change");
            $('#folderModal').modal("show");
            $('#folder_button').val('Update');
            $('#change_title').text("Change Folder Name");
        });

        $(document).on("click", ".delete", function () {
            var folder_name = $(this).data("name");
            var action = "delete";
            if (confirm("Are you sure you want to remove it?")) {
                $.ajax({
                    url: "action.php",
                    method: "POST",
                    data: { folder_name: folder_name, action: action },
                    success: function (data) {
                        load_folder_list();
                        alert(data);
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        $(document).on('click', '.upload', function () {
            var folder_name = $(this).data("name");
            $('#hidden_folder_name').val(folder_name);
            $('#uploadModal').modal('show');
        });

        $('#upload_form').on('submit', function () {
            $.ajax({
                url: "upload.php",
                method: "POST",
                data: new FormData(this),
                contentType: false,
                cache: false,
                processData: false,
                success: function (data) {
                    load_folder_list();
                    alert(data);
                }
            });
        });

        $(document).on('click', '.view_files', function () {
            var folder_name = $(this).data("name");
            var action = "fetch_files";
            $.ajax({
                url: "action.php",
                method: "POST",
                data: { action: action, folder_name: folder_name },
                success: function (data) {
                    $('#file_list').html(data);
                    $('#filelistModal').modal('show');
                }
            });
        });

        $(document).on('click', '.share_file', function () {
            var path = $(this).attr("id");
            var action = "fetch_client";
            var user_id = $("#user_id").val();
            $.ajax({
                url: "action.php",
                method: "POST",
                data: { path: path, action: action, user_id: user_id },
                success: function (data) {
                    $('#filelistModal').modal('hide');
                    $('#client_list').html(data);
                    $('#ClientlistModal').modal('show');
                }
            });
        });

        $(document).on('click', '.remove_file', function () {
            var path = $(this).attr("id");
            var action = "remove_file";
            if (confirm("Are you sure you want to remove this file?")) {
                $.ajax({
                    url: "action.php",
                    method: "POST",
                    data: { path: path, action: action },
                    success: function (data) {
                        alert(data);
                        $('#filelistModal').modal('hide');
                        load_folder_list();
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        $(document).on('blur', '.change_file_name', function () {
            var folder_name = $(this).data("folder_name");
            var old_file_name = $(this).data("file_name");
            var new_file_name = $(this).text();
            var action = "change_file_name";
            $.ajax({
                url: "action.php",
                method: "POST",
                data: { folder_name: folder_name, old_file_name: old_file_name, new_file_name: new_file_name, action: action },
                success: function (data) {
                    // alert(data);
                }
            });
        });

        $(document).on('click', '.client_send', function () {
            if ($(this).prop("checked") == true) {
                var client_id = $(this).attr("id");
                var path = $(this).attr("data");
                var user_id = $("#user_id").val();
                var action = "send";
                $.ajax({
                    url: "https://www.myportalx.com/tool/yogiccoach/action",
                    method: "POST",
                    data: { client_id: client_id, path: path, action: action, user_id: user_id },
                    success: function (data) {

                    }
                });
            } else if ($(this).prop("checked") == false) {
                var client_id = $(this).attr("id");
                var path = $(this).attr("data");
                var action = "remove_send";
                $.ajax({
                    url: "https://www.myportalx.com/tool/yogiccoach/action",
                    method: "POST",
                    data: { client_id: client_id, path: path, action: action },
                    success: function (data) {

                    }
                });
            }
        });

    });
</script>

library backend work

library/action.php 
<?php
$conn = new mysqli("localhost" , "myporta7_AppLive", "100%dev100", "myporta7_YogaPortal");
function format_folder_size($size)
{
 if ($size >= 1073741824)
 {
  $size = number_format($size / 1073741824, 2) . ' GB';
 }
    elseif ($size >= 1048576)
    {
        $size = number_format($size / 1048576, 2) . ' MB';
    }
    elseif ($size >= 1024)
    {
        $size = number_format($size / 1024, 2) . ' KB';
    }
    elseif ($size > 1)
    {
        $size = $size . ' bytes';
    }
    elseif ($size == 1)
    {
        $size = $size . ' byte';
    }
    else
    {
        $size = '0 bytes';
    }
 return $size;
}

function get_folder_size($folder_name)
{
 $total_size = 0;
 $file_data = scandir($folder_name);
 foreach($file_data as $file)
 {
  if($file === '.' or $file === '..')
  {
   continue;
  }
  else
  {
   $path = $folder_name . '/' . $file;
   $total_size = $total_size + filesize($path);
  }
 }
 return format_folder_size($total_size);
}

if(isset($_POST["action"]))
{
 if($_POST["action"] == "fetch")
 {
  $user_id = $_POST['user_id'];
   // = array_filter($userRow['folder_name'], 'is_dir');
  
  $output = '
  <div class="table-wrapper-scroll-y my-custom-scrollbar">
  <table class="table table-bordered table-striped mb-0">
   <tr>
    <th>Folder Name</th>
    <th>Total File</th>
    <th>Size</th>
    <th>Update</th>
    <th>Delete</th>
    <th>Upload File</th>
    <th>View Uploaded File</th>
   </tr>
   ';
   $sql = "SELECT  `folder_name` FROM `library` WHERE `client_id`='$user_id'";
      $result = $conn->query($sql);
if ($result->num_rows > 0) {
      while($name = $result->fetch_assoc()) {
       $output .= '
     <tr>
      <td><i class="fa fa-folder" style="color:#f8d775 ;"></i>&nbsp; '.$name['folder_name'].'</td>
      <td>'.(count(scandir($name['folder_name'])) - 2).'</td>
      <td>'.get_folder_size($name['folder_name']).'</td>
      <td><button type="button" name="update" data-name="'.$name['folder_name'].'" class="update btn btn-warning btn-xs">Update</button></td>
      <td><button type="button" name="delete" data-name="'.$name['folder_name'].'" class="delete btn btn-danger btn-xs">Delete</button></td>
      <td><button type="button" name="upload" data-name="'.$name['folder_name'].'" class="upload btn btn-info btn-xs">Upload File</button></td>
      <td><button type="button" name="view_files" data-name="'.$name['folder_name'].'" class="view_files btn btn-default btn-xs">View Files</button></td>
     </tr>';
      }
    } else
  {
   $output .= '
    <tr>
     <td colspan="6">No Folder Found</td>
    </tr>
   ';
  }
  $output .= '</table></div>';
  echo $output;
 }
 
 if($_POST["action"] == "create")
 {
  $user_id = $_POST['user_id'];
  if(!file_exists($_POST["folder_name"])) 
  {
   mkdir($_POST["folder_name"], 0777, true);
   $folder = $_POST["folder_name"];
   echo 'Folder Created';
   $sql = "INSERT INTO library (`client_id`,`user_id`, `folder_name`)
VALUES ('$user_id','0', '$folder')";
$conn->query($sql);
  }
  else
  {
   echo 'Folder Already Created';
  }
 }
 if($_POST["action"] == "change")
 {
  if(!file_exists($_POST["folder_name"]))
  {
    $old_name = $_POST["old_name"];
    $folder_name = $_POST['folder_name'];

   rename($_POST["old_name"], $_POST["folder_name"]);
   echo 'Folder Name Change';

   $sql = "UPDATE `library` SET `folder_name`='$folder_name'  WHERE `folder_name`='$old_name'";
   $conn->query($sql);
  }
  else
  {
   echo 'Folder Already Created';
  }
 }
 
 if($_POST["action"] == "delete")
 {
  $files = scandir($_POST["folder_name"]);
  foreach($files as $file)
  {
   if($file === '.' or $file === '..')
   {
    continue;
   }
   else
   {
    unlink($_POST["folder_name"] . '/' . $file);
   }
  }
  if(rmdir($_POST["folder_name"]))
  {
    $folder_name = $_POST["folder_name"];
   echo 'Folder Deleted';
   $sql = "DELETE FROM library WHERE `folder_name`='$folder_name'";
   $conn->query($sql);
  }
 }
 
 if ($_POST["action"] == "fetch_client") {
  $path = $_POST['path'];
  $user_id = $_POST['user_id'];
  $output = '
  <div class="table-wrapper-scroll-y my-custom-scrollbar">
  <table class="table table-bordered table-striped mb-0">
   <tr>
    <th>No.</th>
    <th>Select</th>
    <th>Clients Name</th>
   </tr>
  ';

$sql = "SELECT * FROM `mys_users` WHERE `fld_parent`='$user_id' AND `fld_status`='1' ";
      $result = $conn->query($sql);
if ($result->num_rows > 0) {
  $i = 1;
      while($name = $result->fetch_assoc()) {
  $output .='
  <tr>
    <td>'.$i.'</td>
    <td><input type="checkbox" name="client" class="client_send" data="'.$path.'" id="'.$name["fld_id"].'" ></td>
    <td>'.$name["fld_username"].'</td>
  </tr>
  ';
  $i++;
}
}
  $output .='</table></div>';
  echo $output;
 }

//  if ($_POST["action"] == "send") {
//    $client = $_POST["client_id"];
//    $path = $_POST["path"];
//    $user_id = $_POST['user_id'];
//    $sql = "INSERT INTO library (client_id, folder_name,user_id )
// VALUES ('$client', '$path' , '$user_id')";
// $conn->query($sql);
//  }
 
//  if ($_POST['action'] == "remove_send") {
//    $client = $_POST["client_id"];
//    $path = $_POST["path"];

//    $sql = "DELETE FROM library WHERE `folder_name`='$path' AND `client_id`='$client' ";
//    $conn->query($sql);
//  }

 if($_POST["action"] == "fetch_files")
 {
  $file_data = scandir($_POST["folder_name"]);
  $output = '
  <table class="table table-bordered table-striped">
   <tr>
    <th>Image</th>
    <th>File Name</th>
    <th>Download</th>
    <th>Share</th>
    <th>Delete</th>
   </tr>
  ';
  
  foreach($file_data as $file)
  {
   if($file === '.' or $file === '..')
   {
    continue;
   }
   else
   {
    $path = $_POST["folder_name"] . '/' . $file;
    $data = explode(".", $file);
    $extension = $data[1];
    // $allowed_extension = array("jpg", "png", "gif","zip");
 switch ($extension) {
   case "zip":
     $paths = "https://coderthemes.com/highdmin/layouts/assets/images/file_icons/zip.svg";
     break;
     case "pdf":
     $paths = "https://coderthemes.com/highdmin/layouts/assets/images/file_icons/pdf.svg";
     break;
     case "txt":
     $paths = "https://coderthemes.com/highdmin/layouts/assets/images/file_icons/txt.svg";
     break;
     case "docx":
        $paths = "https://coderthemes.com/highdmin/layouts/assets/images/file_icons/doc.svg";
       break;
     default:
     $paths = $path;
 }
    $output .= '
    <tr>
     <td><img src="'.$paths.'" class="img-thumbnail" height="50" width="50" /></td>
     <td contenteditable="true" data-folder_name="'.$_POST["folder_name"].'"  data-file_name = "'.$file.'" class="change_file_name">'.$file.'</td>
     <td><a href="download.php?file=' . $path.'" class="file-download"><i class="fa fa-download"></i></a></td>
     <td><button name="share_file" class="btn btn-info btn-xs share_file" id="'.$path.'">Share</button></td>
     <td><button name="remove_file" class="remove_file btn btn-danger btn-xs" id="'.$path.'">Remove</button></td>
    </tr>
    ';
   }
  }
  $output .='</table>';
  echo $output;
 }
 
 if($_POST["action"] == "remove_file")
 {
  if(file_exists($_POST["path"]))
  {
   unlink($_POST["path"]);
   echo 'File Deleted';
  }
 }
 
 if($_POST["action"] == "change_file_name")
 {
  $old_name = $_POST["folder_name"] . '/' . $_POST["old_file_name"];
  $new_name = $_POST["folder_name"] . '/' . $_POST["new_file_name"];
  if(rename($old_name, $new_name))
  {
   echo 'File name change successfully';
  }
  else
  {
   echo 'There is an error';
  }
 }
}
?>

library share controller

application/controllers/yogiccoach.php 
public function action(){
if ($_POST["action"] == "send")
{
$client = $_POST["client_id"];
$path = $_POST["path"];
$user_id = $_POST['user_id'];

$sender=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$$user_id));
if ($sender->num_rows()>0) {
$row=$sender->row_array();

$senderName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
$senderemail = $row["fld_email"];
}

$receiver=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$client));
if ($receiver->num_rows()>0) {
$row=$receiver->row_array();

$receiverName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
$receiveremail = $row["fld_email"];
}

$sql = "INSERT INTO `library`(`client_id`, `folder_name`,`user_id` ) VALUES ('$client', '$path' , '$user_id')";
$suc = $this->db->query($sql);


if ($suc) {
$message = "

<head>
    <meta http-equiv='Content-Type' content='text/html; charset=windows-1252'>
    <meta name='GENERATOR' content='MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001'>
</head>

<body bgcolor='#ffffff'><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
    <table width='600' align='center' id='TbHeader' bgcolor='#400080' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
        <tr>
            <td align='center' id='TdHeader' bgcolor='#400080'>
                <p align='center'>
                    <font color='#ffffff' face='Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='6'><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
                </p>
            </td>
        </tr>
    </table>
    <table width='600' align='center' id='TbBodyRow' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0'>
        <tr>
            <td id='TdBodyRow' valign='top' bgcolor='#ffffff'>
                <table width='100%' id='TbBody' bgcolor='#ffffff' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
                    <tr>
                        <td align='center' id='TdBody' bgcolor='#ffffff'>
                            &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align='left'>
                                <font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'><strong>Hi
                                        ".$receiverName."&nbsp;<font color='#000000'
                                            face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>&nbsp;</font></strong>
                                </font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
                            </p>
                            <p align='justify' style='margin-right: 0px;'>
                                <font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>This is an
                                    auto-generated email to notify you that your coach ".$senderName." has shared a file
                                    with you on MyportalX.<br><br><a
                                        href='".base_url("library/download.php?file=".$path)."'>Click on this link to
                                        download the file </a></font>
                            </p><br></font>
                            </font>
                            </font>
                            </p>
                            <p align='left'><br></p>
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </table>
            </td>
        </tr>
    </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
    <table width='600' align='center' id='TbFooter' bgcolor='#eea000' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
        <tr>
            <td align='center' id='TdFooter' bgcolor='#eea000'>
                <div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'>
                    <div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
                            style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
                                style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span></span>
                    </div>
                    <div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
                            style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
                                style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'>Regards</span>,<br
                                style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'></span></div>
                    <div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
                            style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'>Team
                            MyportalX</span></div>
                    <div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
                            style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </td>
        </tr>
    </table>
</body>";
$subject = "File Recieved";
$header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
$header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
$header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
$retval = mail($receiveremail,$subject,$message,$header);
}
}

if ($_POST['action'] == "remove_send")
{
$client = $_POST["client_id"];
$path = $_POST["path"];

$sql = "DELETE FROM library WHERE `folder_name`='$path' AND `client_id`='$client' ";
$this->db->query($sql);
}
}

client list



Client List Controller

application/controllers/yogiccoach.php 
public function create_client()
{
$this->load->model("coach_model");
$tbCount = $this->coach_model->get_client_count($this->userid);
$data = array(
"Max_Client" => $tbCount[0]->max_clients,
"Client_Count" => $tbCount[0]->clientCount
);
$this->load->view('yogiccoach/create_client',$data);
}

Client List View

application/views/yogiccoach/create_client.php 
<?php
defined('BASEPATH') OR exit('No direct script access allowed');
error_reporting(0);

$this->load->view('yogiccoach/sidebar1');
$session=$this->session->get_userdata();
$user_id=$session['user_id'];

$count=1;

$this->db->order_by("fld_id", "desc");
$getData=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_parent'=>$user_id,'fld_status'=> '1'));

$this->db->order_by("fld_id", "desc");
$getDatau=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_parent'=>$user_id,'fld_status'=> '0'));

$parent = $this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));
foreach($parent->result() as $rows){
  $coach_name = $rows->fld_first_name.' '. $rows->fld_last_name;
    if(trim($coach_name) == "")
    {
      $coach_name = $rows->fld_username;
    }
  }

 $maximum_client_allow = $Max_Client;
$current_client_count = 0;
$Can_Add_Clients = true;
if($Client_Count != "")
    $current_client_count =$Client_Count;

if($current_client_count >=  $maximum_client_allow )

    $Can_Add_Clients = false;



 if(isset($_POST['save'])){

  if($Can_Add_Clients){   

	 $user_name=$_POST['user_name'];

	 $password=$_POST['password'];

	 $re_password=$_POST['re_password'];

	 $email=$_POST['email'];

	 $rand_code = rand();

	 if($password==$re_password){

	 $userData=array(

    'fld_first_name' => $user_name,
          'fld_last_name' => '',
          'fld_email' => $email,
          'fld_username' => $user_name,
          'fld_password' => $password,
          'fld_program' => '1',
          'fld_user_type' => 'member',
          'fld_create_by' => 'yogiccoach',
          'fld_status' => '0',
          'fld_parent' => $session['user_id'],
          'fld_sponsor' => "",
          'fld_sponsor2' => "",
          'fld_payment_status' => '1',
          'fld_rand_code' =>$rand_code,
          'fld_varification' =>'0',
          'fld_added_date' =>time(),
          'fld_modified_date' => '',
          'fld_Energy_Detox_verified' => '1',
          'fld_Gratitude_verified' => '1',
          'fld_Appointment_verified' => '1',
          'fld_Daily_Score_verified' => '1',
          'fld_Messages_verified' => '1',
          'fld_Chakra_verified' => '1',
          'fld_Wheel_verified' => '1',
          'fld_Intention_verified' => '1',
          'fld_Coaching_verified' => '1'
	 );

            //check if user name already taken

         $getUserData=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_first_name'=>$user_name));



         if($this->db->affected_rows())

         {

             echo "<div class=\"alert alert-danger\">This Username is already taken.<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

         }

         else {

             $this->db->insert('users', $userData);
              $insert_id = $this->db->insert_id();

             if ($this->db->affected_rows()) {
                 //add teacher default working timing
          $ea_userSetting = array(
            'fld_userid' => $insert_id,
            'working_plan' =>'{"monday":{"start":"09:00","end":"18:00","breaks":[{"start":"14:30","end":"15:00"}]},"tuesday":{"start":"09:00","end":"18:00","breaks":[{"start":"14:30","end":"15:00"}]},"wednesday":{"start":"09:00","end":"18:00","breaks":[{"start":"14:30","end":"15:00"}]},"thursday":{"start":"09:00","end":"18:00","breaks":[{"start":"14:30","end":"15:00"}]},"friday":{"start":"09:00","end":"18:00","breaks":[{"start":"14:30","end":"15:00"}]},"saturday":null,"sunday":null}',
            'notifications' =>'1',
            'google_sync' =>  0,
            'google_calendar' => null,
            'google_token' => null,
            'sync_past_days' => '5',
            'sync_future_days'=> '5'
          );
          $this->db->insert('ea_user_settings', $ea_userSetting);

          $ea_categories = array(
            'fld_userid' =>$insert_id,
            'name'=>'Free Services',
            'description' => 'Free Services'
          );
          $this->db->insert('ea_service_categories', $ea_categories);
          $cat_id = $this->db->insert_id();

          $ea_services = array(
            'name' =>$insert_id,
            'duration'=>'30',
            'price' => '0',
            'currency' => '$',
            'description' => '',
            'id_service_Categories' => $cat_id
          );
          $this->db->insert('ea_services', $ea_services);
          
          $coaching_form_status = array(
            'fld_user_id' => $insert_id,
            'fld_form_id' => '2',
            "assign_date"=>time(),
            "completed_date"=>'',
            "last_modified" =>date('Y-m-d H:i:s')
          );

          $this->db->insert('coaching_form_user', $coaching_form_status);
          
          $time = strtotime("now");
		$this->db->query("INSERT INTO `mys_status`(`user_id`,`ustatus`) VALUES ('".$insert_id."','".$time."')");

$msg = '<head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=windows-1252"><meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001"></head><body bgcolor="#ffffff"><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong><table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4"><tr><td align="center" id="TdHeader" bgcolor="#400080"><p align="center"><font color="#ffffff" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="6"><strong>Welcome</strong></font></p></td></tr></table><table width="600" align="center" id="TbBodyRow" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tr><td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff"><table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4"><tr><td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left"><font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"><strong>Congratulations!&nbsp;<font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">&nbsp;</font></strong></font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p align="justify" style="margin-right: 0px;"><font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">Welcome to MyportalX, <br>Coach '.$coach_name.' has added you as a client on MyportalX.com<br>To verify your account kindly click on the link below or copy/paste the URL in your browser. padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span></div><div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Thanks again</span>,<br style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"></span></div><div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;">Rajah Sharma</span></div><div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></div></div></td></tr></table></body>';
         $subject = "You Are Almost There!";
         $message = $msg;
         $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
         $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
         $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
         $retval = mail($email,$subject,$message,$header);

                 if ($retval) {

                     echo "<div   class=\"alert alert-success\">New Client Added Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

                 }



             }

         }

 }else{

	 echo "<div   class=\"alert alert-danger\">Password and Re-Password doesn't match<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

 

 }

 }

 

 else{

     echo "<div class=\"alert alert-danger\">You can't add more Clients.</div>";

 }

 }



 if (isset($_POST['send'])) {

  $email = $_POST['mail'];

  $sbj = $_POST['sbj'];

  $msg = $_POST['msg'];



  $subject = $sbj;

  $message = "Your coach send you a message via MyportalX.<br>";

  $message .= $msg;

  $header = "From: MyPortalX <".$this->config->item("mail_from").">\r\n";

  $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";

  $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";

  

  $retval = mail($email, $subject, $message, $header);

  if ($retval) {

                     echo "<div   class=\"alert alert-success\">Email Sent Successfully.<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";

                 }

}

                <?php

                          if (!isset($_POST['q'])) { 

                            $this->db->order_by("fld_id", "desc");

                          $getuserData=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_parent'=>$user_id,'fld_status'=> '1')); 

                          if($getuserData->num_rows()>0){

                  $CI =& get_instance();

                  $CI->load->model('user_model');

                 $i=1;

                 foreach($getuserData->result() as $row){

                 $user_idm=$row->fld_id;

                $client_name = $row->fld_first_name.' '. $row->fld_last_name;

                   if(trim($client_name) == "")

                     $client_name = $row->fld_username;

                    $das_score = $CI->user_model->get_use_das_average($row->fld_id);

                $image_path=($row->fld_file_name != '')?$row->fld_file_name:'assets/uploads/member/'.'default.png';

                $image = base_url().$image_path;

          $this->db->order_by("user_id", "desc");

          $this->db->where(array('user_id' => $row->fld_id));

$client_last_login = $this->db->get('status');

$last_login = $client_last_login->row()->ustatus;





/************************************ Marketing Form ******************************************/



    $completed1=$this->db->get_where('mys_coaching_form_user',array('fld_user_id'=>$row->fld_id,'fld_form_id'=>'2'));

$row1 = $completed1->row_array();

    if($row1['completed_date']!='')

    {

        $data1 = "<rect x='0' y='40' width='5' height='5' style='fill:#4dff4d;stroke:none' />";              

        }else{

            $data1 = "<rect x='0' y='40' width='5' height='5' style='fill:#0066cc;stroke:none' />";

        }



$completed2=$this->db->get_where('mys_coaching_form_user',array('fld_user_id'=>$row->fld_id,'fld_form_id'=>'28'));

$completed2_1=$this->db->get_where('mys_coaching_form_user',array('fld_user_id'=>$row->fld_id,'fld_form_id'=>'5'));

    

    $row2_1 = $completed2_1->row_array();

    $row2 = $completed2->row_array();

        if($row2['completed_date']!='' and $row2_1['completed_date']!=''){

            $data2 = "<rect x='12' y='35' width='5' height='10' style='fill:#4dff4d;stroke:none' />";    

        }elseif ($row2['completed_date']!='' or $row2_1['completed_date']!='') {

            $data2 = "<rect x='12' y='35' width='5' height='10' style='fill:#ff8000;stroke:none' />";

        }

        else{

            $data2 = "<rect x='12' y='35' width='5' height='10' style='fill:#0066cc;stroke:none' />";

        }



    $completed3 = $this->db->get_where('mys_coaching_form_user',array('fld_user_id'=>$row->fld_id,'fld_form_id'=>'6'));

    

    $row3 = $completed3->row_array();

        if($row3['completed_date']!=''){

            $data3 = "<rect x='24' y='30' width='5' height='15' style='fill:#4dff4d;stroke:none' />";              

        }else{

            $data3 = "

            <rect x='24' y='30' width='5' height='15' style='fill:#0066cc;stroke:none' />";

        }



    $completed4=$this->db->get_where('mys_coaching_form_user',array('fld_user_id'=>$row->fld_id,'fld_form_id'=>'7'));

    $completed4_1=$this->db->get_where('mys_coaching_form_user',array('fld_user_id'=>$row->fld_id,'fld_form_id'=>'25'));

    

    $row4_1 = $completed4_1->row_array();

    $row4 = $completed4->row_array();

        if($row4['completed_date']!='' and $row4_1['completed_date']!=''){

            $data4 = "<rect x='36' y='25' width='5' height='20' style='fill:#4dff4d;stroke:none' />";

            }elseif ($row4['completed_date']!='' or $row4_1['completed_date']!=''){

            $data4 = "<rect x='36' y='25' width='5' height='20' style='fill:#ff8000;stroke:none' />";

        }else{

            $data4 = "<rect x='36' y='25' width='5' height='20' style='fill:#0066cc;stroke:none' />";

        }



    $completed5=$this->db->get_where('mys_coaching_form_user',array('fld_user_id'=>$row->fld_id,'fld_form_id'=>'21'));

    $completed5_1=$this->db->get_where('mys_coaching_form_user',array('fld_user_id'=>$row->fld_id,'fld_form_id'=>'14'));

        $row5_1 = $completed5_1->row_array();

    $completed5_2=$this->db->get_where('mys_coaching_form_user',array('fld_user_id'=>$row->fld_id,'fld_form_id'=>'16'));

        $row5_2 = $completed5_2->row_array();

    $completed5_3=$this->db->get_where('mys_coaching_form_user',array('fld_user_id'=>$row->fld_id,'fld_form_id'=>'20'));

        $row5_3 = $completed5_3->row_array();

    $completed5_4=$this->db->get_where('mys_coaching_form_user',array('fld_user_id'=>$row->fld_id,'fld_form_id'=>'26'));

        $row5_4 = $completed5_4->row_array();

        $row5 = $completed5->row_array();

        

        if($row5['completed_date']!='' and $row5_1['completed_date']!='' and $row5_2['completed_date']!='' and $row5_3['completed_date']!='' and $row5_4['completed_date']!=''){

            $data5 = "<rect x='48' y='20' width='5' height='25' style='fill:#4dff4d;stroke:none' />";              

        }elseif(($row5['completed_date']!='' and $row5_1['completed_date']!='' and $row5_3['completed_date']!='') or ($row5_2['completed_date']!='' and $row5_4['completed_date']!='')){

            $data5 = "<rect x='48' y='20' width='5' height='25' style='fill:#ffff4d;stroke:none' />";

        }elseif(($row5['completed_date']!='' and $row5_1['completed_date']!='') or (($row5_2['completed_date']!='' or $row5_3['completed_date']!='') and ($row5_4['completed_date']!=''))) {

            $data5 = "<rect x='48' y='20' width='5' height='25' style='fill:#ff8000;stroke:none' />";

        }elseif($row5['completed_date']!='' or $row5_1['completed_date']!='' or $row5_2['completed_date']!='' or $row5_3['completed_date']!='' or $row5_4['completed_date']!='') {

            <div class="tab-pane fade" id="tab2success">

                <?php if($getDatau->num_rows()>0){

									$CI =& get_instance();

									$CI->load->model('user_model');

								 $i=1;

								 foreach($getDatau->result() as $rowu){

								 $client_nameu=$rowu->fld_id;

								$client_nameu = $rowu->fld_first_name.' '. $rowu->fld_last_name;

									 if(trim($client_nameu) == "")

										 $client_nameu = $rowu->fld_username;

									 	$das_scoreu = $CI->user_model->get_use_das_average($rowu->fld_id);

								$image_pathu=($rowu->fld_file_name != '')?$rowu->fld_file_name:'assets/uploads/member/'.'default.png';

								$imageu = base_url().$image_pathu;

					$this->db->order_by("user_id", "desc");

					$this->db->where(array('user_id' => $rowu->fld_id));

$client_last_loginu = $this->db->get('status');

$last_loginu = $client_last_loginu->row()->ustatus;



$get_completed_form1u=$this->db->get_where('mys_coaching_form_user',array('fld_user_id'=>$rowu->fld_id,'fld_form_id'=>'2'));

$row_completed1u=$get_completed_form1u->row_array();

    if($row_completed1u['completed_date']!='')

    {

        $data1u = "<rect x='0' y='40' width='5' height='5' style='fill:#95b75d;stroke:none' />";

    }else{

            $data1u = "<rect x='0' y='40' width='5' height='5' style='fill:#434a54; stroke:none' />";

        }



$completed2u=$this->db->get_where('mys_coaching_form_user',array('fld_user_id'=>$rowu->fld_id,'fld_form_id'=>'28'));

$completed2_1u=$this->db->get_where('mys_coaching_form_user',array('fld_user_id'=>$rowu->fld_id,'fld_form_id'=>'5'));

$row2_1u = $completed2_1u->row_array();

$row2u = $completed2u->row_array();

    if($row2u['completed_date']!='' and $row2_1u['completed_date']!='')

    {

        $data2u = "<rect x='12' y='35' width='5' height='10' style='fill:#95b75d;stroke:none' />";              

    }else

    {

        $data2u = "<rect x='12' y='35' width='5' height='10' style='fill:#434a54;stroke:none' />";

Client Dashboard



Client Dashboard Controller

application/controllers/yogiccoach.php 
public function edit_profile($user_id='')
{


if($this->isAuthorized($user_id)){
$data = array();

$this->load->model("user_model");

$marketing_forms = $this->user_model->get_marketing_forms($user_id,'', true);
$user_marketing_forms = $this->user_model->get_marketing_forms($user_id,'', false);

$coaching_forms = $this->user_model->get_coaching_forms($user_id,'', true);
$user_coaching_forms = $this->user_model->get_coaching_forms($user_id,'', false);
$this->load->model("coach_model");
$checklist = $this->coach_model->get_checklist($user_id);
$mchecklist = $this->coach_model->get_mchecklist($user_id);


//$data['memberImages']=$this->Admin_model->get_table_records('chakra_reading',array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id));
$data['minor']=$this->Common_model->get_table_records('chakra_reading_minor',array(),"fld_id","asc");
$data['major']=$this->Common_model->get_table_records('chakra_reading_major',array(),"fld_id","asc");
$data['aura']=$this->Common_model->get_table_records('chakra_reading_aura',array(),"fld_id","asc");
$data['user_id']=$user_id;
$data['coaching_forms'] = $coaching_forms;
$data['marketing_forms'] = $marketing_forms;
$data["checklist"] = $checklist;
$data["mchecklist"] = $mchecklist;
$data["modules"] = $this->modulelist;

$this->load->view('yogiccoach/edit_profile',$data);
}
}

Client Dashboard view

application/views/yogiccoach/edit_profile.php 
<?php 
$this->load->view('yogiccoach/sitebars');
 defined('BASEPATH') OR exit('No direct script access allowed');
 $this->lang->load('date', 'english');
 $session = $this->session->get_userdata();
$image='';
$userRow='';
 if(!isset($session['logged_in'])){
   redirect(base_url());
   exit;
}else{
    $login_id=$session['user_id'];
      $varification=$session['varification_code'];
    $userData = $this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=> $login_id));
    if ($userData->num_rows()>0) {
       $userRow = $userData->row_array();
       $image_path=($userRow['fld_file_name']!='')?$userRow['fld_file_name']:'assets/uploads/member/'.'default.jpg';
         $image = base_url().$image_path;
    }
     else{
         $this->session->sess_destroy();
         redirect(base_url());
     }
    if($varification=='0'){
       redirect(base_url('registration'));
    }else{
     //redirect(base_url('member'));
   }
}
if(isset($_REQUEST["uploadChakraImages"])){
  if(!empty($_FILES['filename'])) {
    $error       = false;
    $ds          = DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR;
    $storeFolder = 'assets/uploads/chakra-reading/';
    $is_blank=false;
    $iname=array();

    for($i=0;$i<=8;$i++){
      if($_FILES['filename']['name'][$i]==''){
        $is_blank=true;
        echo '<div class="alert alert-danger">Please Select All Field</div>';
        break;
      }else{
        continue;
      }
    }
    if(!$is_blank) {


      foreach ($_FILES["filename"]["name"] as $key => $name) {
        $tmp_name = $_FILES["filename"]["tmp_name"][$key];
        $iname[] = $name;
        $targetPath = FCPATH . $storeFolder . $ds;
        $targetFile = $targetPath . $name;
        move_uploaded_file($tmp_name, $targetFile);

      }
      $insetImage = array(
        'fld_user_id' => $user_id,
        'fld_image1' => $iname[0],
        'fld_image2' => $iname[1],
        'fld_image3' => $iname[2],
        'fld_image4' => $iname[3],
        'fld_image5' => $iname[4],
        'fld_image6' => $iname[5],
        'fld_image7' => $iname[6],
        'fld_image8' => $iname[7],
        'fld_image9' => $iname[8],
        'fld_added_date' => time()
      );
      $submit = $this->db->insert('chakra_reading', $insetImage);
      if ($this->db->affected_rows()) {
        echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\"><strong>Success! </strong>.<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";
      }
    }

  }else{
    echo '<div class="alert alert-danger">How did you do that?O_o</div>';
  }
}
$userData1 = $this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=> $user_id));
    if ($userData1->num_rows()>0) {
       $userRow1 = $userData1->row_array();
        $a = $userRow1['fld_Energy_Detox_verified'];
        $b = $userRow1['fld_Gratitude_verified'];
        $c = $userRow1['fld_Appointment_verified'];
        $d = $userRow1['fld_Daily_Score_verified'];
        $e = $userRow1['fld_Messages_verified'];
        $f = $userRow1['fld_Chakra_verified'];
        $g = $userRow1['fld_Wheel_verified'];
        $h = $userRow1['fld_Intention_verified'];
        $i = $userRow1['fld_Coaching_verified'];

         $total = $a + $b + $c + $d + $e + $f + $g + $h + $i;
     }

$this->db->order_by("fld_id", "desc");
$getData=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_parent'=>$login_id));
$get = $getData->result();
$num_client = $getData->num_rows();

$userData = $this->db->get_where('chat',array('receiver_id'=> $login_id ,'status'=>'0'));
    if ($userData->num_rows()>0) {
  $countMsg=$userData->num_rows();  
}else{
  $countMsg=0;
}
