<?php $this->load->view("yogiccoach/foot"); ?>

client Permission



client Permission Controller

application/controllers/yogiccoach.php 
public function permission($user_id= ''){
if($this->isAuthorized($user_id)){
$data['user_id']=$user_id;

$this->load->view('yogiccoach/permission',$data);
}
}
public function delet_permition_notifiction($userid = 0){
$this->db->delete('notification', array('urls' => 'permission/'.$userid));
}
    public function update_market_status($clientID=0,$status = null){
    
    $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$clientID));
    if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
    $row=$coach->row_array();
    $coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
    $email = $row["fld_email"];
    $coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
    }
    
    $this->db->where("fld_id", $clientID);
    $this->db->set("fld_marketing", $status);
    $this->db->update("users");
    
    if($this->db->affected_rows()){
    if ($status == 1)
    {
    $message = '
    
    <head>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
        <meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001">
    </head>
    
    <body bgcolor="#ffffff"><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdHeader" bgcolor="#400080">
                    <p align="center">
                        <font color="#ffffff" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="6"><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
                    </p>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbBodyRow" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
            <tr>
                <td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                    <table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
                        <tr>
                            <td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                                &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"><strong>Hi
                                            '.$coachName.'&nbsp;<font color="#000000"
                                                face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">&nbsp;</font></strong>
                                    </font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
                                </p>
                                <p align="justify" style="margin-right: 0px;">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">This is an
                                        auto-generated email to notify you that your coach '.$adminName.' has activated
                                        <b>"Business form"</b> for you on MyportalX.<br><br>Use these great features on
                                        MyportalX to stay engaged with your coach. </font>
                                </p><br></font>
                                </font>
                                </font>
                                </p>
                                <p align="left"><br></p>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbFooter" bgcolor="#eea000" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000">
                    <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);">
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Regards</span>,<br
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"></span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;">Team
                                MyportalX</span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
    </body>';
    $subject = "Module Permission Activated";
    $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
    $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
    $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
    $retval = mail($email,$subject,$message,$header);
    }else
    {
    $message = '
    
    <head>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
        <meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001">
    </head>
    
    <body bgcolor="#ffffff"><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdHeader" bgcolor="#400080">
                    <p align="center">
                        <font color="#ffffff" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="6"><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
                    </p>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbBodyRow" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
            <tr>
                <td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                    <table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
                        <tr>
                            <td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                                &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"><strong>Hi
                                            '.$coachName.'&nbsp;<font color="#000000"
                                                face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">&nbsp;</font></strong>
                                    </font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
                                </p>
                                <p align="justify" style="margin-right: 0px;">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">This is an
                                        auto-generated email to notify you that your coach '.$adminName.' has Deactivated
                                        <b>"Business form"</b> for you on MyportalX.<br><br>Use these great features on
                                        MyportalX to stay engaged with your coach. </font>
                                </p><br></font>
                                </font>
                                </font>
                                </p>
                                <p align="left"><br></p>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbFooter" bgcolor="#eea000" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000">
                    <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);">
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Regards</span>,<br
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"></span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;">Team
                                MyportalX</span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
    </body>';
    $subject = "Module Permission Deactivated";
    $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
    $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
    $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
    $retval = mail($email,$subject,$message,$header);
    }
    }
    }
    public function update_client_status($clientID=0,$status = null){
    
    if(isset($status)) {
    $this->db->where("fld_id", $clientID);
    $this->db->set("fld_status", $status);
    $this->db->update("users");
    
    }
    }
    public function fld_Energy_Detox_verified($id = "" , $status = ""){
    
    $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$id));
    if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
    $row=$coach->row_array();
    $coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
    $email = $row["fld_email"];
    $coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
    }
    
    $this->db->where("fld_id", $id);
    $this->db->set("fld_Energy_Detox_verified", $status);
    $this->db->update("users");
    
    if($this->db->affected_rows()){
    if ($status == 1)
    {
    $message = '
    
    <head>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
        <meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001">
    </head>
    
    <body bgcolor="#ffffff"><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdHeader" bgcolor="#400080">
                    <p align="center">
                        <font color="#ffffff" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="6"><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
                    </p>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbBodyRow" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
            <tr>
                <td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                    <table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
                        <tr>
                            <td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                                &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"><strong>Hi
                                            '.$coachName.'&nbsp;<font color="#000000"
                                                face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">&nbsp;</font></strong>
                                    </font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
                                </p>
                                <p align="justify" style="margin-right: 0px;">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">This is an
                                        auto-generated email to notify you that your coach '.$adminName.' has activated
                                        <b>"Negative Energy Detox"</b> module for you on MyportalX.<br><br>Use these great
                                        features on MyportalX to stay engaged with your coach. </font>
                                </p><br></font>
                                </font>
                                </font>
                                </p>
                                <p align="left"><br></p>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbFooter" bgcolor="#eea000" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000">
                    <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);">
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Regards</span>,<br
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"></span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;">Team
                                MyportalX</span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
    </body>';
    $subject = "Module Permission Activated";
    $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
    $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
    $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
    $retval = mail($email,$subject,$message,$header);
    }else
    {
    $message = '
    
    <head>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
        <meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001">
    </head>
    
    <body bgcolor="#ffffff"><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdHeader" bgcolor="#400080">
                    <p align="center">
                        <font color="#ffffff" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="6"><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
                    </p>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbBodyRow" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
            <tr>
                <td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                    <table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
                        <tr>
                            <td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                                &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"><strong>Hi
                                            '.$coachName.'&nbsp;<font color="#000000"
                                                face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">&nbsp;</font></strong>
                                    </font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
                                </p>
                                <p align="justify" style="margin-right: 0px;">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">This is an
                                        auto-generated email to notify you that your coach '.$adminName.' has Deactivated
                                        <b>"Negative Energy Detox"</b> module for you on MyportalX.<br><br>Use these great
                                        features on MyportalX to stay engaged with your coach. </font>
                                </p><br></font>
                                </font>
                                </font>
                                </p>
                                <p align="left"><br></p>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbFooter" bgcolor="#eea000" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000">
                    <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);">
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Regards</span>,<br
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"></span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;">Team
                                MyportalX</span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
    </body>';
    $subject = "Module Permission Deactivated";
    $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
    $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
    $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
    $retval = mail($email,$subject,$message,$header);
    }
    }
    }
    public function fld_Gratitude_verified($id = "", $status = ""){
    $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$id));
    if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
    $row=$coach->row_array();
    $coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
    $email = $row["fld_email"];
    $coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
    }
    
    $this->db->where("fld_id",$id);
    $this->db->set("fld_Gratitude_verified",$status);
    $this->db->update("users");
    
    if($this->db->affected_rows()){
    if ($status == 1)
    {
    $message = '
    
    <head>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
        <meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001">
    </head>
    
    <body bgcolor="#ffffff"><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdHeader" bgcolor="#400080">
                    <p align="center">
                        <font color="#ffffff" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="6"><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
                    </p>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbBodyRow" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
            <tr>
                <td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                    <table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
                        <tr>
                            <td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                                &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"><strong>Hi
                                            '.$coachName.'&nbsp;<font color="#000000"
                                                face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">&nbsp;</font></strong>
                                    </font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
                                </p>
                                <p align="justify" style="margin-right: 0px;">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">This is an
                                        auto-generated email to notify you that your coach '.$adminName.' has activated
                                        <b>"Gratitude Journal"</b> module for you on MyportalX.<br><br>Use these great
                                        features on MyportalX to stay engaged with your coach. </font>
                                </p><br></font>
                                </font>
                                </font>
                                </p>
                                <p align="left"><br></p>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbFooter" bgcolor="#eea000" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000">
                    <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);">
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Regards</span>,<br
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"></span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;">Team
                                MyportalX</span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
    </body>';
    $subject = "Module Permission Activated";
    $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
    $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
    $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
    $retval = mail($email,$subject,$message,$header);
    }else
    {
    $message = '

        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
        <meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001">
    </head>
    
    <body bgcolor="#ffffff"><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdHeader" bgcolor="#400080">
                    <p align="center">
                        <font color="#ffffff" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="6"><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
                    </p>

            <tr>
                <td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                    <table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
                        <tr>
                            <td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                                &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"><strong>Hi
                                            '.$coachName.'&nbsp;<font color="#000000"
                                                face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">&nbsp;</font></strong>
                                    </font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">This is an
                                        auto-generated email to notify you that your coach '.$adminName.' has Deactivated
                                        <b>"Gratitude Journal"</b> module for you on MyportalX.<br><br>Use these great
                                        features on MyportalX to stay engaged with your coach. </font>
                                </p><br></font>

                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbFooter" bgcolor="#eea000" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000">
                    <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);">
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Regards</span>,<br
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"></span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;">Team
                                MyportalX</span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
    </body>';
    $subject = "Module Permission Deactivated";
    $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
    $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
    $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
    $retval = mail($email,$subject,$message,$header);
    }
    }
    }
    
    public function fld_Appointment_verified($id = "", $status = ""){
    
    $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$id));
    if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
    $row=$coach->row_array();
    $coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
    $email = $row["fld_email"];
    $coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
    }
    
    $this->db->where("fld_id",$id);
    $this->db->set("fld_Appointment_verified",$status);
    $this->db->update("users");
    
    if($this->db->affected_rows()){
    if ($status == 1) {
    $message = '
    
    <head>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
        <meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001">
    </head>
    
    <body bgcolor="#ffffff"><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdHeader" bgcolor="#400080">
                    <p align="center">
                        <font color="#ffffff" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="6"><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
                    </p>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbBodyRow" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
            <tr>
                <td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                    <table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
                        <tr>
                            <td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                                &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"><strong>Hi
                                            '.$coachName.'&nbsp;<font color="#000000"
                                                face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">&nbsp;</font></strong>
                                    </font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
                                </p>
                                <p align="justify" style="margin-right: 0px;">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">This is an
                                        auto-generated email to notify you that your coach '.$adminName.' has activated
                                        <b>"Appointment Scheduler"</b> module for you on MyportalX.<br><br>Use these great
                                        features on MyportalX to stay engaged with your coach. </font>
                                </p><br></font>
                                </font>
                                </font>
                                </p>
                                <p align="left"><br></p>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbFooter" bgcolor="#eea000" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000">
                    <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);">
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Regards</span>,<br
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"></span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;">Team
                                MyportalX</span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
    </body>';
    $subject = "Module Permission Activated";
    $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
    $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
    $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
    $retval = mail($email,$subject,$message,$header);
    }else
    {
    $message = '
    
    <head>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
        <meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001">
    </head>
    
    <body bgcolor="#ffffff"><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdHeader" bgcolor="#400080">
                    <p align="center">
                        <font color="#ffffff" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="6"><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
                    </p>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbBodyRow" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
            <tr>
                <td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                    <table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
                        <tr>
                            <td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                                &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"><strong>Hi
                                            '.$coachName.'&nbsp;<font color="#000000"
                                                face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">&nbsp;</font></strong>
                                    </font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
                                </p>
                                <p align="justify" style="margin-right: 0px;">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">This is an
                                        auto-generated email to notify you that your coach '.$adminName.' has Deactivated
                                        <b>"Appointment Scheduler"</b> module for you on MyportalX.<br><br>Use these great
                                        features on MyportalX to stay engaged with your coach. </font>
                                </p><br></font>
                                </font>
                                </font>
                                </p>
                                <p align="left"><br></p>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbFooter" bgcolor="#eea000" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000">
                    <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);">
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Regards</span>,<br
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"></span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;">Team
                                MyportalX</span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
    </body>';
    $subject = "Module Permission Deactivated";
    $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
    $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
    $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
    $retval = mail($email,$subject,$message,$header);
    }
    
    
    }
    }
    public function fld_Daily_Score_verified($id = "", $status = ""){
    
    $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$id));
    if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
    $row=$coach->row_array();
    $coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
    $email = $row["fld_email"];
    $coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
    }
    
    $this->db->where("fld_id",$id);
    $this->db->set("fld_Daily_Score_verified",$status);
    $this->db->update("users");
    if($this->db->affected_rows()){
    if ($status == 1) {
    $message = '
    
    <head>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
        <meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001">
    </head>
    
    <body bgcolor="#ffffff"><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdHeader" bgcolor="#400080">
                    <p align="center">
                        <font color="#ffffff" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="6"><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
                    </p>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbBodyRow" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
            <tr>
                <td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                    <table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
                        <tr>
                            <td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                                &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"><strong>Hi
                                            '.$coachName.'&nbsp;<font color="#000000"
                                                face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">&nbsp;</font></strong>
                                    </font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
                                </p>
                                <p align="justify" style="margin-right: 0px;">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">This is an
                                        auto-generated email to notify you that your coach '.$adminName.' has activated
                                        <b>"Daily Accountability Score"</b> module for you on MyportalX.<br><br>Use these
                                        great features on MyportalX to stay engaged with your coach. </font>
                                </p><br></font>
                                </font>
                                </font>
                                </p>
                                <p align="left"><br></p>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbFooter" bgcolor="#eea000" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000">
                    <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);">
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span

                    </div>
                </td>
            </tr>

                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span

                    </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
    </body>';

    $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
    $retval = mail($email,$subject,$message,$header);
    }

    public function fld_Messages_verified($id = "", $status = ""){
    $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$id));
    if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
    $row=$coach->row_array();
    $coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
    $email = $row["fld_email"];
    $coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
    }
    
    $this->db->where("fld_id",$id);
    $this->db->set("fld_Messages_verified",$status);
    $this->db->update("users");
    
    if($this->db->affected_rows()){
    if ($status == 1) {
    $message = '
    
    <head>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
        <meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001">
    </head>
    
    <body bgcolor="#ffffff"><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdHeader" bgcolor="#400080">
                    <p align="center">
                        <font color="#ffffff" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="6"><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
                    </p>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbBodyRow" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
            <tr>
                <td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                    <table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
                        <tr>
                            <td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                                &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"><strong>Hi
                                            '.$coachName.'&nbsp;<font color="#000000"

                                        auto-generated email to notify you that your coach '.$adminName.' has activated
                                        <b>"Messages"</b> module for you on MyportalX.<br><br>Use these great features on

                            </td>

                </td>
            </tr>

            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000">
                    <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);">
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span

                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Regards</span>,<br

                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span

                                MyportalX</span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
    </body>';
    $subject = "Module Permission Deactivated";
    $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
    $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
    $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
    $retval = mail($email,$subject,$message,$header);
    }
    
    }

    public function fld_Chakra_verified($id = "", $status = ""){
    $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$id));
    if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
    $row=$coach->row_array();
    $coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
    $email = $row["fld_email"];
    $coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
    }
    $this->db->where("fld_id",$id);
    $this->db->set("fld_Chakra_verified",$status);
    $this->db->update("users");
    
    if($this->db->affected_rows()){
    if ($status == 1)
    {
    $message = '
    
    <head>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
        <meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001">
    </head>
    
    <body bgcolor="#ffffff"><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdHeader" bgcolor="#400080">
                    <p align="center">
                        <font color="#ffffff" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="6"><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
                    </p>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbBodyRow" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
            <tr>
                <td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                    <table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
                        <tr>
                            <td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                                &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"><strong>Hi
                                            '.$coachName.'&nbsp;<font color="#000000"
                                                face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">&nbsp;</font></strong>
                                    </font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
                                </p>
                                <p align="justify" style="margin-right: 0px;">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">This is an
                                        auto-generated email to notify you that your coach '.$adminName.' has activated
                                        <b>"Chakra Reading"</b> module for you on MyportalX.<br><br>Use these great features
                                        on MyportalX to stay engaged with your coach. </font>
                                </p><br></font>
                                </font>
                                </font>
                                </p>
                                <p align="left"><br></p>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbFooter" bgcolor="#eea000" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000">
                    <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);">
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Regards</span>,<br
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"></span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;">Team
                                MyportalX</span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
    </body>';
    $subject = "Module Permission Activated";
    $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
    $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
    $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
    $retval = mail($email,$subject,$message,$header);
    }else
    {
    $message = '
    
    <head>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
        <meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001">
    </head>
    
    <body bgcolor="#ffffff"><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdHeader" bgcolor="#400080">
                    <p align="center">
                        <font color="#ffffff" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="6"><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
                    </p>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbBodyRow" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
            <tr>
                <td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                    <table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
                        <tr>
                            <td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                                &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"><strong>Hi
                                            '.$coachName.'&nbsp;<font color="#000000"
                                                face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">&nbsp;</font></strong>
                                    </font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
                                </p>
                                <p align="justify" style="margin-right: 0px;">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">This is an
                                        auto-generated email to notify you that your coach '.$adminName.' has Deactivated
                                        <b>"Chakra Reading"</b> module for you on MyportalX.<br><br>Use these great features
                                        on MyportalX to stay engaged with your coach. </font>
                                </p><br></font>
                                </font>
                                </font>
                                </p>
                                <p align="left"><br></p>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbFooter" bgcolor="#eea000" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000">
                    <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);">
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Regards</span>,<br
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"></span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;">Team
                                MyportalX</span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
    </body>';
    $subject = "Module Permission Deactivated";
    $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
    $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
    $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
    $retval = mail($email,$subject,$message,$header);
    }
    }
    }
    public function fld_Wheel_verified($id = "", $status = ""){
    $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$id));
    if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
    $row=$coach->row_array();
    $coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
    $email = $row["fld_email"];
    $coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
    }
    $this->db->where("fld_id",$id);
    $this->db->set("fld_Wheel_verified",$status);
    $this->db->update("users");
    
    if($this->db->affected_rows()){
    if ($status == 1) {
    $message = '
    
    <head>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
        <meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001">
    </head>
    
    <body bgcolor="#ffffff"><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdHeader" bgcolor="#400080">
                    <p align="center">
                        <font color="#ffffff" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="6"><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
                    </p>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbBodyRow" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
            <tr>
                <td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                    <table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
                        <tr>
                            <td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                                &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"><strong>Hi
                                            '.$coachName.'&nbsp;<font color="#000000"
                                                face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">&nbsp;</font></strong>
                                    </font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
                                </p>
                                <p align="justify" style="margin-right: 0px;">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">This is an
                                        auto-generated email to notify you that your coach '.$adminName.' has activated
                                        <b>"Wheel Of Life"</b> module for you on MyportalX.<br><br>Use these great features
                                        on MyportalX to stay engaged with your coach. </font>
                                </p><br></font>
                                </font>
                                </font>
                                </p>
                                <p align="left"><br></p>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbFooter" bgcolor="#eea000" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000">
                    <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);">
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Regards</span>,<br
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"></span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;">Team
                                MyportalX</span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
    </body>';
    $subject = "Module Permission Activated";
    $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
    $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
    $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
    $retval = mail($email,$subject,$message,$header);
    }else
    {
    $message = '

        <meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001">
    </head>

        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">

                                            '.$coachName.'&nbsp;<font color="#000000"

                                    </font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

                                        auto-generated email to notify you that your coach '.$adminName.' has Deactivated

        </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>

            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000">
                    <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);">
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Regards</span>,<br
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"></span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;">Team
                                MyportalX</span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
    </body>';
    $subject = "Module Permission Deactivated";
    $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
    $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
    $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
    $retval = mail($email,$subject,$message,$header);
    }
    
    }
    }
    public function fld_Intention_verified($id = "", $status = ""){
    $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$id));
    if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
    $row=$coach->row_array();
    $coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
    $email = $row["fld_email"];
    $coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
    }
    $this->db->where("fld_id",$id);
    $this->db->set("fld_Intention_verified",$status);
    $this->db->update("users");
    if($this->db->affected_rows()){
    if ($status == 1) {
    $message = '
    
    <head>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
        <meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001">
    </head>
    
    <body bgcolor="#ffffff"><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdHeader" bgcolor="#400080">
                    <p align="center">
                        <font color="#ffffff" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="6"><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
                    </p>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbBodyRow" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
            <tr>
                <td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                    <table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
                        <tr>
                            <td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                                &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"><strong>Hi
                                            '.$coachName.'&nbsp;<font color="#000000"
                                                face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">&nbsp;</font></strong>
                                    </font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
                                </p>
                                <p align="justify" style="margin-right: 0px;">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">This is an
                                        auto-generated email to notify you that your coach '.$adminName.' has activated
                                        <b>"Intention Setting"</b> module for you on MyportalX.<br><br>Use these great
                                        features on MyportalX to stay engaged with your coach. </font>
                                </p><br></font>
                                </font>
                                </font>
                                </p>
                                <p align="left"><br></p>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbFooter" bgcolor="#eea000" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000">
                    <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);">
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Regards</span>,<br
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"></span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;">Team
                                MyportalX</span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
    </body>';
    $subject = "Module Permission Activated";
    $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
    $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
    $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
    $retval = mail($email,$subject,$message,$header);
    }else{
    $message = '

        <meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001">
    </head>

        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbBodyRow" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
            <tr>
                <td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                    <table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
                        <tr>
                            <td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                                &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left">

                                        auto-generated email to notify you that your coach '.$adminName.' has Deactivated
                                        <b>"Intention Setting"</b> module for you on MyportalX.<br><br>Use these great

                </td>
            </tr>
        </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
