            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000">
                    <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);">
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Regards</span>,<br
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"></span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;">Team
                                MyportalX</span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
    </body>';
    $subject = "Module Permission Deactivated";
    $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
    $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
    $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
    $retval = mail($email,$subject,$message,$header);
    }
    
    }
    }
    public function fld_Coaching_verified($id = "", $status = ""){
    $coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$id));
    if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
    $row=$coach->row_array();
    $coachName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
    $email = $row["fld_email"];
    $coachsparent_id = $row["fld_parent"];
    }
    
    $admin=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$coachsparent_id));
    if ($admin->num_rows()>0) {
    $row=$admin->row_array();
    $adminName = $row["fld_username"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
    }
    
    $this->db->where("fld_id",$id);
    $this->db->set("fld_Coaching_verified",$status);
    $this->db->update("users");
    
    if($this->db->affected_rows()){
    if ($status == 1) {
    $message = '
    
    <head>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
        <meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001">
    </head>
    
    <body bgcolor="#ffffff"><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdHeader" bgcolor="#400080">
                    <p align="center">
                        <font color="#ffffff" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="6"><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
                    </p>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbBodyRow" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
            <tr>
                <td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                    <table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
                        <tr>
                            <td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                                &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"><strong>Hi
                                            '.$coachName.'&nbsp;<font color="#000000"
                                                face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">&nbsp;</font></strong>
                                    </font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
                                </p>
                                <p align="justify" style="margin-right: 0px;">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">This is an
                                        auto-generated email to notify you that your coach '.$adminName.' has activated
                                        <b>"Coaching Session"</b> module for you on MyportalX.<br><br>Use these great
                                        features on MyportalX to stay engaged with your coach. </font>
                                </p><br></font>
                                </font>
                                </font>
                                </p>
                                <p align="left"><br></p>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbFooter" bgcolor="#eea000" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000">
                    <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);">
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Regards</span>,<br
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"></span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;">Team
                                MyportalX</span></div>
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
    </body>';
    $subject = "Module Permission Activated";
    $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
    $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
    $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
    $retval = mail($email,$subject,$message,$header);
    }else{
    $message = '
    
    <head>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
        <meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001">
    </head>
    
    <body bgcolor="#ffffff"><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">

                    <p align="center">
                        <font color="#ffffff" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="6"><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
                    </p>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbBodyRow" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
            <tr>
                <td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                    <table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
                        <tr>
                            <td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">
                                &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left">
                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"><strong>Hi
                                            '.$coachName.'&nbsp;<font color="#000000"
                                                face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">&nbsp;</font></strong>
                                    </font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

                                    <font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">This is an
                                        auto-generated email to notify you that your coach '.$adminName.' has Deactivated
                                        <b>"Coaching Session"</b> module for you on MyportalX.<br><br>Use these great
                                        features on MyportalX to stay engaged with your coach. </font>

                                </font>
                                </font>
                                </p>
                                <p align="left"><br></p>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
        <table width="600" align="center" id="TbFooter" bgcolor="#eea000" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4">
            <tr>
                <td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000">
                    <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);">
                        <div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span
                                style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span
                                    style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span>
                        </div>

application/views/yogiccoach/permission.php 
<?php $this->load->view('yogiccoach/sidebar1'); 
$memberName = "";
error_reporting(1);
    $session = $this->session->get_userdata();
    $login_id=$session['user_id'];
    $coach = $this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$login_id));
if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
    $c_row = $coach->row_array();
    $coach_form = $c_row['fld_cform'];
}
$user=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));
    if ($user->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$user->row_array();

        $memberName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $memberStatus = $row["fld_status"];
        $memberemail = $row["fld_email"];
        $marketing_form = $row['fld_marketing'];
    }
?>
<div class="page-title">
    <h2>Client:
        <?php echo $memberName;?>
    </h2>
    <div class="row text-center">
        <div class="col-md-6">
            <?php if($coach_form == '1'){ ?>
            <h4>Business Module</h4>
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox" <?php echo $marketing_form=="1" ? 'checked="checked"' : '' ;?> value="
                <?php echo$user_id;?>" class="market_status">
                <span></span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <?php }else{} ?>
        <div class="col-md-6">
            <h4>Client On/Off</h4>
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox" <?php echo $memberStatus=="1" ? 'checked="checked"' : '' ;?> value="
                <?php echo$user_id;?>" class="client_status">
                <span></span>
            </label>
        </div>

    </div>

<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $.ajax({
            url: "<?php echo base_url(); ?>yogiccoach/delet_permition_notifiction/<?php echo $user_id ?>",
            success: function (result) {
                // $("#div1").html(result);
            }
        });
    });
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".market_status").click(function () {
            var _id = $(this).val();
            var _status = $(this).is(":checked") ? "1" : "0";
            $.get(home_url + "yogiccoach/update_market_status/" + _id + "/" + _status, "", function (response) {
                console.log(response);
            });
        });

        $(".client_status").click(function () {
            var _id = $(this).val();
            var _status = $(this).is(":checked") ? "1" : "0";
            $.get(home_url + "yogiccoach/update_client_status/" + _id + "/" + _status, "", function (response) {
                console.log(response);
            });
        });
        $(".fld_Energy_Detox_verified").click(function () {
            var _id = $(this).val();
            var _status = $(this).is(":checked") ? "1" : "0";
            $.get(home_url + "yogiccoach/fld_Energy_Detox_verified/" + _id + "/" + _status, "", function (response) {
                console.log(response);
            });
        });

        $(".fld_Gratitude_verified").click(function () {
            var _id = $(this).val();
            var _status = $(this).is(":checked") ? "1" : "0";
            $.get(home_url + "yogiccoach/fld_Gratitude_verified/" + _id + "/" + _status, "", function (response) {
                console.log(response);
            });
        });
        $(".fld_Appointment_verified").click(function () {
            var _id = $(this).val();
            var _status = $(this).is(":checked") ? "1" : "0";
            $.get(home_url + "yogiccoach/fld_Appointment_verified/" + _id + "/" + _status, "", function (response) {
                console.log(response);
            });
        });
        $(".fld_Daily_Score_verified").click(function () {
            var _id = $(this).val();
            var _status = $(this).is(":checked") ? "1" : "0";
            $.get(home_url + "yogiccoach/fld_Daily_Score_verified/" + _id + "/" + _status, "", function (response) {
                console.log(response);
            });
        });
        $(".fld_Messages_verified").click(function () {
            var _id = $(this).val();
            var _status = $(this).is(":checked") ? "1" : "0";
            $.get(home_url + "yogiccoach/fld_Messages_verified/" + _id + "/" + _status, "", function (response) {
                console.log(response);
            });
        });
        $(".fld_Chakra_verified").click(function () {
            var _id = $(this).val();
            var _status = $(this).is(":checked") ? "1" : "0";
            $.get(home_url + "yogiccoach/fld_Chakra_verified/" + _id + "/" + _status, "", function (response) {
                console.log(response);
            });
        });
        $(".fld_Wheel_verified").click(function () {
            var _id = $(this).val();
            var _status = $(this).is(":checked") ? "1" : "0";
            $.get(home_url + "yogiccoach/fld_Wheel_verified/" + _id + "/" + _status, "", function (response) {
                console.log(response);
            });
        });
        $(".fld_Intention_verified").click(function () {
            var _id = $(this).val();
            var _status = $(this).is(":checked") ? "1" : "0";
            $.get(home_url + "yogiccoach/fld_Intention_verified/" + _id + "/" + _status, "", function (response) {
                console.log(response);
            });
        });
        $(".fld_Coaching_verified").click(function () {
            var _id = $(this).val();
            var _status = $(this).is(":checked") ? "1" : "0";
            $.get(home_url + "yogiccoach/fld_Coaching_verified/" + _id + "/" + _status, "", function (response) {
                console.log(response);
            });
        });
    });
</script>
<?php $this->load->view('yogiccoach/footer'); ?>

Client form reports



Client form reports Controller

application/controllers/yogiccoach.php 
public function mreport($user_id=''){
if($this->isAuthorized($user_id)){
$data = array();

$this->load->model("user_model");

$marketing_forms = $this->user_model->get_marketing_forms($user_id,'', true);
$user_marketing_forms = $this->user_model->get_marketing_forms($user_id,'', false);

$coaching_forms = $this->user_model->get_coaching_forms($user_id,'', true);
$user_coaching_forms = $this->user_model->get_coaching_forms($user_id,'', false);
$this->load->model("coach_model");
$checklist = $this->coach_model->get_checklist($user_id);
$mchecklist = $this->coach_model->get_mchecklist($user_id);

$data['user_id']=$user_id;
$data['coaching_forms'] = $coaching_forms;
$data['marketing_forms'] = $marketing_forms;
$data["checklist"] = $checklist;
$data["mchecklist"] = $mchecklist;
$data["modules"] = $this->modulelist;

$this->load->view('yogiccoach/mreport',$data);
}
}
public function delet_report_notifiction($userid = 0){
$this->db->delete('notification', array('urls' => 'mreport/'.$userid));
}
public function get_report_records($clientID, $module, $action){
$result ="";
if($this->db->table_exists($module)){

$this->db->order_by('fld_id DESC');
if(in_array($module,$this->moduleMultiRow))
{
$this->db->distinct();
$this->db->select('fld_added_date as fld_id,fld_added_date');
}
$records =$this->db->get_where($module,array("fld_user_id"=>$clientID));
$result ="<div class=\"table-responsive\">";
    $result .="<table class=\"table table-striped table-bordered\">";
        $result .="<tr>";
            $result .="<td class=\"text-center\">S.No.</td>";
            $result .="<td class=\"text-center\">Dated</td>";
            $result .="<td class=\"text-center\">Action</td>";
            $result .="</tr>";
        if($records->num_rows() > 0){
        $cnt=0;
        foreach( $records->result() as $row){
        $cnt++;
        $result .="<tr>";
            $result .="<td class=\"text-center\">".$cnt."</td>";
            $result .="<td class=\"text-center\">".date('m-d-Y',$row->fld_added_date)."</td>";
            $result .="<td class=\"text-center\">
                <button type=\"button\" class=\"btn btn-danger btn-condensed mb-control \"
                    onclick='javascript:viewreport(this);' title='View Report' data-name='".$module."'
                    data-id='". $row->fld_id ."' data-box=\"#message-box-pdfview\"><i class=\"glyphicon
                        glyphicon-eye-open\"></i></button>
                <button type=\"button\" class=\"btn btn-success btn-condensed \"
                    onclick='javascript:downloadreport(this);' title='Download Report PDF' data-name='".$module."'
                    data-id='". $row->fld_id ."'><i class=\"glyphicon glyphicon-cloud-download\"></i></button>
                <button type=\"button\" class=\"btn btn-warning btn-condensed \" onclick='javascript:sendreport(this);'
                    title='Send Report to Client' data-name='".$module."' data-id='". $row->fld_id ."'><i class=\"fa
                        fa-envelope\"></i></button>
                <span id='msg'></span>
            </td>";
            $result .="</tr>";
        }
        }
        else{
        $result .= "<tr>
            <td colspan='3' style='text-align:center;color:red;font-size:14px'>No record found</td>
        </tr>";
        }
        $result .="</table>";
    $result .="</div>";
}
else{
echo "error: table - ".$module;
}

echo $result;
}
public function get_client_report($recID, $clientID, $module, $action){

//echo "REC -". $recID ." C: ". $clientID . " M: " . $module . " A: " . $action;
if($this->db->table_exists($module)){
$moduleTitle = $this->modulelist[$module];
if(in_array($module,$this->moduleMultiRow))
{
$record =$this->db->get_where($module,array("fld_added_date"=> $recID, "fld_user_id"=>$clientID),1,0);
}else{
$record =$this->db->get_where($module,array("fld_id"=> $recID, "fld_user_id"=>$clientID),1,0);
}
$clientDetails = $this->db->get_where("users", array("fld_id"=>$clientID),1,0);
if($record->num_rows()>0 && $clientDetails->num_rows() > 0){
$clientDetails = $clientDetails->row();
$data = array(
"Client" => $clientDetails,
"Record" => $record->result_array()
);
$clientName = $clientDetails->fld_first_name.'-'.$clientDetails->fld_last_name;
$clientEmail = $clientDetails->fld_email;

$this->load->model('user_model');
$coachDetails =$this->user_model->get_row($this->userid);
$coachName ="";
$coachEmail="";

if(sizeof($coachDetails)>0){
$coachName =$coachDetails['fld_first_name'].' '. $coachDetails['fld_last_name'];
$coachEmail=$coachDetails['fld_email'];
}
$html = $this->load->view('yogiccoach/ajax/content_report_'.$module,$data, true);
if($action =="view")
{
echo $html;
}
else if($action == "download"){
$pdfFilePath = "Report-".str_replace($moduleTitle,' ','-').'-'.$clientName.".pdf";
$this->load->library('m_pdf');
ob_clean();
$this->m_pdf->pdf->WriteHTML($html);
$pdfFile = $this->m_pdf->pdf->Output($pdfFilePath,"D");
ob_end_clean();
}
else if($action =="send"){
$pdfFilePath = "Report-".str_replace($moduleTitle,' ','-').'-'.$clientName.".pdf";
$this->load->library('m_pdf');
ob_clean();
$this->m_pdf->pdf->WriteHTML($html);
$pdfFile = $this->m_pdf->pdf->Output($pdfFilePath);

$subject = "Check out your reports";
$message= "

<head>
    <meta http-equiv='Content-Type' content='text/html; charset=windows-1252'>
    <meta name='GENERATOR' content='MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001'>
</head>

<body bgcolor='#ffffff'><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
    <table width='600' align='center' id='TbHeader' bgcolor='#400080' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
        <tr>
            <td align='center' id='TdHeader' bgcolor='#400080'>
                <p align='center'>
                    <font color='#ffffff' face='Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='6'><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
                </p>
            </td>
        </tr>
    </table>
    <table width='600' align='center' id='TbBodyRow' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0'>
        <tr>
            <td id='TdBodyRow' valign='top' bgcolor='#ffffff'>
                <table width='100%' id='TbBody' bgcolor='#ffffff' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
                    <tr>
                        <td align='center' id='TdBody' bgcolor='#ffffff'>
                            &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align='left'>
                                <font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'><strong>Hi
                                        ".$clientName."&nbsp;<font color='#000000'
                                            face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>&nbsp;</font></strong>
                                </font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
                            </p>
                            <p align='justify' style='margin-right: 0px;'>
                                <font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>This email
                                    is generated to send you your reports sent by your coach ".$coachName." from
                                    MyportalX. You can view and download your reports from the attachment in this email.
                                </font>
                            </p><br></font>
                            </font>
                            </font>
                            </p>
                            <p align='left'><br></p>
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </table>
            </td>
        </tr>
    </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
    <table width='600' align='center' id='TbFooter' bgcolor='#eea000' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
        <tr>
            <td align='center' id='TdFooter' bgcolor='#eea000'>
                <div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'>
                    <div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
                            style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
                                style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span></span>
                    </div>
                    <div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
                            style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
                                style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'>Regards</span>,<br
                                style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'></span></div>
                    <div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
                            style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'>Team
                            MyportalX</span></div>
                    <div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
                            style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </td>
        </tr>
    </table>
</body>";

/************************pallavi code start**************************/
$file = $pdfFilePath;
$file_size = filesize($file);
$handle = fopen($file, "r");
$content = fread($handle, $file_size);
fclose($handle);
//$content = chunk_split(base64_encode($content));
$from='MyPortalX';
$separator = md5(time());
$eol = PHP_EOL;
$filename = "Report-".$moduleTitle.'--'.$clientName.".pdf";
$attachment = chunk_split(base64_encode($content));
$headers = "From: " . $from . $eol;
if($coachEmail !='')
$headers .= 'Cc: '. $coachName .'<'.$coachEmail.'>\r\n';
    /*$headers .= 'Bcc: test@test.com\r\n';*/
    $headers .= "MIME-Version: 1.0" . $eol;
    $headers .= "Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary=\"" . $separator . "\"" . $eol . $eol;
    $body = "";
    $body .= "Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit" . $eol;
    $body .= "This is a MIME encoded message." . $eol;
    $body .= "--" . $separator . $eol;
    $body .= "Content-Type: text/html; charset=\"iso-8859-1\"" . $eol;
    $body .= "Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit" . $eol . $eol;
    $body .= $message . $eol;
    $body .= "--" . $separator . $eol;
    $body .= "Content-Type: application/octet-stream; name=\"" . $filename . "\"" . $eol;
    $body .= "Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64" . $eol;
    $body .= "Content-Disposition: attachment" . $eol . $eol;
    $body .= $attachment . $eol;
    $body .= "--" . $separator . "--";

    /*******************pallavi code end*************************/

    $retval = mail ($clientEmail,$subject,$body,$headers);
    $response_message="sent";
    }
    }
    }
    }

Client form reports view

application/views/yogiccoach/mreport.php 
<?php 
$this->load->view('yogiccoach/sidebar');
	error_reporting(1);
	$session = $this->session->get_userdata();
	$login_id=$session['user_id'];
?>
<div id="error_container"></div>
<div class="panel panel-default">
    <div class="panel-body">
        <h3 class="push-down-0">Reports</h3>
    </div>
    <div class="panel-body">
        <div class="col-lg-12">
            <div class="form-inline">
                <div class="form-group">
                    <label>Report Of:&nbsp;&nbsp;</label>

                    <select id="ddlreportof" name="ddlreportof" class="form-control" style="width:400px;">
                        <option value="">-select</option>
                        <?php foreach($modules as $key => $value)
                {
                   
                   echo "<option value='{$key}'>{$value}</option>";
                    
                }
                ?>
                    </select>&nbsp;<button type="button" class="btn btn-warning reportdata"
                        data-id="<?php echo $user_id;?>">Show</button>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="clearfix"><br></div>
            <div class="col-lg-12" id="dvreportresult">
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="message-box  animated fadeIn popup-scroll" id="message-box-pdfview">
    <div class="mb-container">
        <div class="mb-middle">
            <div class="mb-title">
                <div class="pull-right"> <span class="fa fa-close  mb-control-close"
                        onclick="javascript:$('#message-box-pdfview').hide();"></span></div>
            </div>
            <div class="mb-content" id="pdfcontent"></div>
            <div class="mb-footer"><button class="btn btn-default btn-lg pull-right mb-control-close"
                    onclick="javascript:$('#message-box-pdfview').hide();">Close</button></div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $.ajax({
            url: "<?php echo base_url(); ?>yogiccoach/delet_report_notifiction/<?php echo $user_id ?>",
            success: function (result) {
                $("#div1").html(result);
            }
        });
    });
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $("#ddlreportof").change(function () {
            $("#dvreportresult").html("");
            var reportof = $("#ddlreportof").val();
            if (reportof != "")
                $(".reportdata").click();
        })
        $(".reportdata").click(function () {
            $("#dvreportresult").html("<img src='<?php echo base_url();?>assets/img/processing.gif' alt='loading' />");
            var reportof = $("#ddlreportof").val();
            debugger;
            $.get(home_url + "yogiccoach/get_report_records/<?php echo $user_id;?>/" + reportof + "/show"
                , "", function (response) {
                    $("#dvreportresult").html(response);
                });
        })

        downloadreport = function (obj) {
            var recid = $(obj).attr('data-id');
            var mod = $(obj).attr('data-name');
            //  $('#msg').html("wait your pdf Download");
            url = home_url + "yogiccoach/get_client_report/" + recid + "/" + <? php echo $user_id;?> +"/" + mod + "/download";
            window.location.assign(url);
            // 			$('#msg').html("");
        };
        viewreport = function (obj) {
            var recid = $(obj).attr('data-id');
            var mod = $(obj).attr('data-name');
            $.get(home_url + "yogiccoach/get_client_report/" + recid + "/" +<? php echo $user_id;?> +"/" + mod + "/view", "", function (response) {

                if (response != '') {
                    $('#pdfcontent').html(response);
                    $("#message-box-pdfview").show(1000);
                }
                else {
                    $('#error_container').html('<div class="alert alert-warning fade in"><strong></strong> ' + response + '</div>').show();
                    $("#error_container").show().delay(3000).queue(function (n) {
                        $(obj).hide();
                    });
                }

            });
		}
    sendreport = function (obj) {
        var recid = $(obj).attr('data-id');
        var mod = $(obj).attr('data-name');
        $('#msg').html("Reports Sending In Progress. Do Not Close This Tab.");
        $.get(home_url + "yogiccoach/get_client_report/" + recid + "/" +<? php echo $user_id;?> +"/" + mod + "/send", "", function (response) {
            if (response = "sent") {
                $('#error_container').html('<div class="alert alert-success fade in">Report Were Successfully Sent To Your Email Id. Please Check Your Inbox.</div>').show();
                $("#error_container").show().delay(3000).queue(function (n) {
                    //$(obj).hide();
                    $('#msg').html("");
                });
            }
            else {
                $('#error_container').html('<div class="alert alert-warning fade in"><strong></strong> ' + response + '</div>').show();
                $("#error_container").show().delay(3000).queue(function (n) {
                    //$(this).hide();
                });
            }

        });
    };
	});
</script>
<?php $this->load->view('yogiccoach/footer'); ?>

Chakra Reading



Chakra Reading Controller

application/controllers/yogiccoach.php 
public function chakra_reading($user_id= ''){

if($this->isAuthorized($user_id)){
$data = array();
$data['minor']=$this->Common_model->get_table_records('chakra_reading_minor',array(),"fld_id","asc");
$data['major']=$this->Common_model->get_table_records('chakra_reading_major',array(),"fld_id","asc");
$data['aura']=$this->Common_model->get_table_records('chakra_reading_aura',array(),"fld_id","asc");
$data['user_id']=$user_id;
$this->load->view('yogiccoach/chakra_reading',$data);
}
}
public function client_upload_chakra()
	{
	    $response['status'] = 0;
	    
	    $client_id = $_POST['cid'];
	    $image1 = $_POST['image1'];
	    $image2 = $_POST['image2'];
	    $image3 = $_POST['image3'];
	    $image4 = $_POST['image4'];
	    $image5 = $_POST['image5'];
	    $image6 = $_POST['image6'];
	    $image7 = $_POST['image7'];
	    $image8 = $_POST['image8'];
	    $image9 = $_POST['image9'];
	    $insetImage = array(
				'fld_user_id' => $client_id,
				'fld_image1' => $image1,
				'fld_image2' => $image2,
				'fld_image3' => $image3,
				'fld_image4' => $image4,
				'fld_image5' => $image5,
				'fld_image6' => $image6,
				'fld_image7' => $image7,
				'fld_image8' => $image8,
				'fld_image9' => $image9,
				'fld_added_date' => time()
			);
			$submit = $this->db->insert('client_chakra_reading', $insetImage);
			if ($this->db->affected_rows()) {
			    $response['status'] = 1;
			}
			
			echo json_encode($response);
	}
    public function search_option_chakra(){
    $keyword=$this->input->post('keyword');
    if ($keyword != "") {
    $this->db->like("fld_position", $keyword);
    }
    $this->db->like("fld_position", $keyword);
    $data = $this->db->get('chakra_reading_minor')->result_array();
    echo json_encode($data);
    }
    public function delet_chakra_notifiction($userid = 0)
    {
    $this->db->delete('notification', array('urls' => 'chakra_reading/'.$userid));
    }
    public function add_chakra_reading_notes(){
		if(isset($_POST["cid"]) && isset($_POST["no"]) && isset($_POST["notes"]) && isset($_POST["sec"]))
		{
			$response['status'] = 0;
			$response['message'] = '';
			$response['data'] = array();

			$clientid=$_POST['cid'];
			$no=$_POST['no'];
			$notes=$_POST['notes'];
            $sec = $_POST['sec'];
			$planDATA=array(
				'fld_notes_number'=>$no,
                'fld_section' => $sec,
				'fld_notes'=>$notes,
				'fld_user_id'=>$clientid,
				'fld_downloaded' =>'0',
				'fld_added_date'=>time()
			);
			$this->db->insert('yogi_notes',$planDATA);
			if($this->db->affected_rows()){
				//update notes table
				/*$this->db->select("yn.*, crm.fld_position");
				$this->db->from("yogi_notes as yn");
				$this->db->join("chakra_reading_minor as crm" , "yn.fld_notes_number = crm.fld_id","left");
				$this->db->where(array('fld_user_id'=>$clientid,'fld_notes_number !=' => '','fld_downloaded'=>'0'));
				$this->db->order_by('crm.fld_id');
				$number = $this->db->get()->result();*/
                $number = $this->db->get_where('yogi_notes',array('fld_user_id'=>$clientid))->result();
				$row_cont=1;
				$catRow='';
				foreach ($number as $Row){
					$catRow.='<tr class="gradeA" id="trnote_'.$Row->fld_id.'">
						<td>'.$row_cont.'</td>
                        <td>'.$Row->fld_section.'</td>
						<td>'.$Row->fld_notes_number.'</td>
						<td>'.nl2br($Row->fld_notes).'</td>
						<td class="text-center"><a href="javascript:void(0)" style="color:red" class="removenotes" data-id="'.$Row->fld_id.'"><i class="glyphicon glyphicon-remove"></i></a></td>
				</tr>';
					$row_cont++;
				}

				$response['status'] = 1;
				$response['message'] = 'Notes Added';
				$response['data'] =  $catRow;
			}else{
				$response['status'] = 0;
				$response['message'] = 'failed';
				$response['data'] = "";
			}

		}
		else{
			$response['status'] = 0;
			$response['message'] = 'Required data missing';
			$response['data'] = "";
		}
		echo json_encode($response);
	}
    public function download_chakra_reading_notes($clientID){
    
    $clientDetails = $this->db->get_where("users", array("fld_id"=>$clientID),1,0);
    if($clientDetails->num_rows()){
    $clientDetails = $clientDetails->row();
    $clientName = $clientDetails->fld_first_name.' '.$clientDetails->fld_last_name;
    /*$this->db->select("yn.*, crm.fld_position");
    $this->db->from("yogi_notes as yn");
    $this->db->join("chakra_reading_minor as crm" , "yn.fld_notes_number = crm.fld_id","left");
    $this->db->where(array('fld_user_id'=>$clientID,'fld_notes_number !=' => ''));
    $this->db->order_by('crm.fld_id');
    $notesData = $this->db->get()->result();//, 'fld_downloaded'=>0
    */
    $notesData = $this->db->get_where('yogi_notes',array('fld_user_id'=>$clientID))->result();
    $data = array(
    "Client" => $clientName,
    "Notes" => $notesData
    );
    
    $html=$this->load->view('yogiccoach/ajax/content_chakra_notes', $data,true);
    $filename = $clientDetails->fld_first_name.'-'.$clientDetails->fld_last_name;
    $pdfFilePath = "chakra-report-of-".$filename.".pdf";
    $this->load->library('m_pdf');
    ob_clean();
    $this->m_pdf->pdf->WriteHTML($html);
    $pdfFile = $this->m_pdf->pdf->Output($pdfFilePath,"D");
    ob_end_clean();
    
    //mark all records download
    $this->db->where("fld_user_id",$clientID);
    $this->db->update("yogi_notes",array("fld_downloaded"=>"1"));
    }
    
    }
    public function delete_chakra_reading_notes()
	{	$noteid=0;$clientID=0;
		if(isset($_REQUEST["id"]))
			$noteid = $_REQUEST["id"];
		if(isset($_REQUEST["cid"]))
			$clientID = $_REQUEST["cid"];
		$this->db->where(array("fld_id"=>$noteid, "fld_user_id"=>$clientID));
		$ret =$this->db->delete("yogi_notes");
		if($ret == 1)
			echo "success";

	}
    public function get_client_report($recID, $clientID, $module, $action){
    
    //echo "REC -". $recID ." C: ". $clientID . " M: " . $module . " A: " . $action;
    if($this->db->table_exists($module)){
    $moduleTitle = $this->modulelist[$module];
    if(in_array($module,$this->moduleMultiRow))
    {
    $record =$this->db->get_where($module,array("fld_added_date"=> $recID, "fld_user_id"=>$clientID),1,0);
    }else{
    $record =$this->db->get_where($module,array("fld_id"=> $recID, "fld_user_id"=>$clientID),1,0);
    }
    $clientDetails = $this->db->get_where("users", array("fld_id"=>$clientID),1,0);
    if($record->num_rows()>0 && $clientDetails->num_rows() > 0){
    $clientDetails = $clientDetails->row();
    $data = array(
    "Client" => $clientDetails,
    "Record" => $record->result_array()
    );
    $clientName = $clientDetails->fld_first_name.'-'.$clientDetails->fld_last_name;
    $clientEmail = $clientDetails->fld_email;
    
    $this->load->model('user_model');
    $coachDetails =$this->user_model->get_row($this->userid);
    $coachName ="";
    $coachEmail="";
    
    if(sizeof($coachDetails)>0){
    $coachName =$coachDetails['fld_first_name'].' '. $coachDetails['fld_last_name'];
    $coachEmail=$coachDetails['fld_email'];
    }
    $html = $this->load->view('yogiccoach/ajax/content_report_'.$module,$data, true);
    if($action =="view")
    {
    echo $html;
    }
    else if($action == "download"){
    $pdfFilePath = "Report-".str_replace($moduleTitle,' ','-').'-'.$clientName.".pdf";
    $this->load->library('m_pdf');
    ob_clean();
    $this->m_pdf->pdf->WriteHTML($html);
    $pdfFile = $this->m_pdf->pdf->Output($pdfFilePath,"D");
    ob_end_clean();
    }
    else if($action =="send"){
    $pdfFilePath = "Report-".str_replace($moduleTitle,' ','-').'-'.$clientName.".pdf";
    $this->load->library('m_pdf');
    ob_clean();
    $this->m_pdf->pdf->WriteHTML($html);
    $pdfFile = $this->m_pdf->pdf->Output($pdfFilePath);
    
    $subject = "Check out your reports";
    $message= "
    
    <head>
        <meta http-equiv='Content-Type' content='text/html; charset=windows-1252'>
        <meta name='GENERATOR' content='MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001'>
    </head>
    
    <body bgcolor='#ffffff'><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong>
        <table width='600' align='center' id='TbHeader' bgcolor='#400080' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
            <tr>
                <td align='center' id='TdHeader' bgcolor='#400080'>
                    <p align='center'>
                        <font color='#ffffff' face='Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='6'><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
                    </p>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
        <table width='600' align='center' id='TbBodyRow' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0'>
            <tr>
                <td id='TdBodyRow' valign='top' bgcolor='#ffffff'>
                    <table width='100%' id='TbBody' bgcolor='#ffffff' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
                        <tr>
                            <td align='center' id='TdBody' bgcolor='#ffffff'>
                                &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align='left'>
                                    <font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'><strong>Hi
                                            ".$clientName."&nbsp;<font color='#000000'
                                                face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>&nbsp;</font></strong>
                                    </font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
                                </p>
                                <p align='justify' style='margin-right: 0px;'>
                                    <font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>This email
                                        is generated to send you your reports sent by your coach ".$coachName." from
                                        MyportalX. You can view and download your reports from the attachment in this email.
                                    </font>
                                </p><br></font>
                                </font>
                                </font>
                                </p>
                                <p align='left'><br></p>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong>
        <table width='600' align='center' id='TbFooter' bgcolor='#eea000' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
            <tr>
                <td align='center' id='TdFooter' bgcolor='#eea000'>
                    <div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'>
                        <div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
                                style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
                                    style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span></span>
                        </div>
                        <div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
                                style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
                                    style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'>Regards</span>,<br
                                    style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'></span></div>
                        <div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
                                style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'>Team
                                MyportalX</span></div>
                        <div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
                                style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
    </body>";
    
    /************************pallavi code start**************************/
    $file = $pdfFilePath;
    $file_size = filesize($file);
    $handle = fopen($file, "r");
    $content = fread($handle, $file_size);
    fclose($handle);
    //$content = chunk_split(base64_encode($content));
    $from='MyPortalX';
    $separator = md5(time());
    $eol = PHP_EOL;
    $filename = "Report-".$moduleTitle.'--'.$clientName.".pdf";
    $attachment = chunk_split(base64_encode($content));
    $headers = "From: " . $from . $eol;
    if($coachEmail !='')
    $headers .= 'Cc: '. $coachName .'<'.$coachEmail.'>\r\n';
        /*$headers .= 'Bcc: test@test.com\r\n';*/
        $headers .= "MIME-Version: 1.0" . $eol;
        $headers .= "Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary=\"" . $separator . "\"" . $eol . $eol;
        $body = "";
        $body .= "Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit" . $eol;
        $body .= "This is a MIME encoded message." . $eol;
        $body .= "--" . $separator . $eol;
        $body .= "Content-Type: text/html; charset=\"iso-8859-1\"" . $eol;
        $body .= "Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit" . $eol . $eol;
        $body .= $message . $eol;
        $body .= "--" . $separator . $eol;
        $body .= "Content-Type: application/octet-stream; name=\"" . $filename . "\"" . $eol;
        $body .= "Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64" . $eol;
        $body .= "Content-Disposition: attachment" . $eol . $eol;
        $body .= $attachment . $eol;
        $body .= "--" . $separator . "--";
    
        /*******************pallavi code end*************************/
    
        $retval = mail ($clientEmail,$subject,$body,$headers);
        $response_message="sent";
        }
        }
        }
        }
        public function forgot_user_password($clientID)
        {
        $clientDetails = $this->db->get_where("users", array("fld_id"=>$clientID),1,0);
        if($clientDetails->num_rows()){
        $clientDetails = $clientDetails->row();
        $clientName = $clientDetails->fld_first_name.' '.$clientDetails->fld_last_name;
        $clientEmail= $clientDetails->fld_email;
        $fld_parent=$clientDetails->fld_parent;
        $fld_rand_code = $clientDetails->fld_rand_code;
        }
        $admin=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$fld_parent));
        if ($admin->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$admin->row_array();
        
        $adminName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $adminemail = $row["fld_email"];
        }
        $message="<table width='600' align='center' id='TbHeader' bgcolor='#400080' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
            <tr>
                <td align='center' id='TdHeader' bgcolor='#400080'>
                    <p align='center'>
                        <font color='#ffffff' face='Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='6'><strong>Welcome</strong></font>
                    </p>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
        <table width='600' align='center' id='TbBodyRow' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0'>
            <tr>
                <td id='TdBodyRow' valign='top' bgcolor='#ffffff'>
                    <table width='100%' id='TbBody' bgcolor='#ffffff' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
                        <tr>
                            <td align='center' id='TdBody' bgcolor='#ffffff'>
                                &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align='left'>
                                    <font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>Hi
                                        ".$clientName."<br><br>Your coach ".$adminName." recently requested to reset the
                                        password for your MyportalX account. Click on the link below to reset your
                                        password.<br><br><a
                                            style='background:#33b5e5;color:#ffffff;border:none;border-radius:5px;padding:5px 10px;text-decoration:none'
                                            href='".base_url(' Registration/forgot_password/'.$fld_rand_code)."'> RESET PASSWORD
                                        </a><br><br>If you/your coach didn't requested a password reset you can safely ignore
                                        this email or contact us immediately at support@myportalx.com&nbsp;<font color='#000000'
                                            face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>&nbsp;</font>
                                    </font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
                                </p>
                                <p align='justify' style='margin-right: 0px;'>
                                    <font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'></font>
                                <p align='justify' style='margin-right: 0px;'>
                                    <font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'><br></font>
                                </p>
                                </p>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong></strong>
        <table width='600' align='center' id='TbFooter' bgcolor='#eea000' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'>
            <tr>
                <td align='center' id='TdFooter' bgcolor='#eea000'>
                    <div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'>
                        <div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
                                style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
                                    style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span></span>
                        </div>
                        <div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
                                style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span
                                    style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'>Regards,</span><br
                                    style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'></span></div>
                        <div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
                                style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'>Team
                                MyportalX</span></div>
                        <div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span
                                style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>";
        $subject = "Password Reset";
        $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
        $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
        $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
        $retval = mail($clientEmail,$subject,$message,$header);
        
        $response_message="sent";
        
        }
        public function send_chakra_reading_notes($clientID){
        
        $clientDetails = $this->db->get_where("users", array("fld_id"=>$clientID),1,0);
        if($clientDetails->num_rows()){
        $clientDetails = $clientDetails->row();
        $clientName = $clientDetails->fld_first_name.' '.$clientDetails->fld_last_name;
        $clientEmail= $clientDetails->fld_email;
        $notesData = $this->db->get_where('yogi_notes',array('fld_user_id'=>$clientID))->result();
        $data = array(
        "Client" => $clientName,
        "Notes" => $notesData
        );
        
        
        $moduleTitle ="Chakra Reading Notes";
        $html=$this->load->view('yogiccoach/ajax/content_chakra_notes', $data,true);
        $pdfFilePath = "Report-".str_replace($moduleTitle,' ','-').'-'.$clientName.".pdf";
        
        $this->load->library('m_pdf');
        ob_clean();
        $this->m_pdf->pdf->WriteHTML($html);
        $pdfFile = $this->m_pdf->pdf->Output($pdfFilePath);
        //ob_end_clean();
        
        $subject = "Report ". $moduleTitle;
        $message= "";
        $message .="To view your report please download attachment. ";
        /************************pallavi code start**************************/
        $file = $pdfFilePath;
        $file_size = filesize($file);
        $handle = fopen($file, "r");
        $content = fread($handle, $file_size);
        fclose($handle);
        //$content = chunk_split(base64_encode($content));
        $from="MyPortalX";
        $separator = md5(time());
        $eol = PHP_EOL;
        $filename = "Report-".$moduleTitle.'--'.$clientName.".pdf";
        $attachment = chunk_split(base64_encode($content));
        $headers = "From: " . $from . $eol;
        
        $headers .= "MIME-Version: 1.0" . $eol;
        $headers .= "Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary=\"" . $separator . "\"" . $eol . $eol;
        $body = "";
        $body .= "Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit" . $eol;
        $body .= "This is a MIME encoded message." . $eol;
        $body .= "--" . $separator . $eol;
        $body .= "Content-Type: text/html; charset=\"iso-8859-1\"" . $eol;
        $body .= "Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit" . $eol . $eol;
        $body .= $message . $eol;
        $body .= "--" . $separator . $eol;
        $body .= "Content-Type: application/octet-stream; name=\"" . $filename . "\"" . $eol;
        $body .= "Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64" . $eol;
        $body .= "Content-Disposition: attachment" . $eol . $eol;
        $body .= $attachment . $eol;
        $body .= "--" . $separator . "--";
        
        $retval = mail ($clientEmail,$subject,$body,$headers);
        $response_message="sent";
        }
        
        }
        public function get_chakra_section_details($section,$id,$option){
        $response = "";
        $option = str_replace("-","_",$option);
        switch ($section){
        case "minor":
        if ($this->db->field_exists('fld_affirmations_'.$option, 'chakra_reading_minor'))
        {
        $this->db->select('fld_id, fld_ques,fld_explaination,fld_position,fld_keywords, fld_thoughts_'. $option.' as thoughts,
        fld_affirmations_'.$option. ' as affirmation');
        $result = $this->db->get_where("chakra_reading_minor", array('fld_id'=> $id));
        if($result->num_rows() >0){
        $row = $result->row();
        echo "<p><strong>Question: </strong>". $row->fld_ques."</p>";
        echo "<p><strong>Explaination: </strong>".$row->fld_explaination."</p>";
        echo "<p><strong>Thoughts: </strong>".$row->thoughts."</p>";
        echo "<p><strong>Affirmation: </strong>".$row->affirmation."</p>";
        }
        
        }
        break;
        case "major":
        if ($this->db->field_exists('fld_pendulum_movement_'.$option, 'chakra_reading_major'))
        {
        $this->db->select('fld_id, fld_name,fld_sanskrit_name,fld_location,fld_attribute, fld_symptom,
        fld_affirmation,fld_pendulum_movement_'.$option .' as movement');
        $result = $this->db->get_where("chakra_reading_major", array('fld_id'=> $id));
        if($result->num_rows() >0){
        $row = $result->row();
        echo "<p><strong>Sanskrit Name: </strong>". $row->fld_sanskrit_name."</p>";
        echo "<p><strong>Location: </strong>".$row->fld_location."</p>";
        echo "<p><strong>Attributes: </strong>".$row->fld_attribute."</p>";
        echo "<p><strong>Symptom: </strong>".$row->fld_symptom."</p>";
        echo "<p><strong>Affirmation: </strong>".$row->fld_affirmation."</p>";
        echo "<p><strong>Pendulum movement: </strong>".$row->movement."</p>";
        }
        }
        break;
        case "aura":
        $result = $this->db->get_where("chakra_reading_aura", array('fld_id'=> $id));
        if($result->num_rows() >0){
        $row = $result->row();
        echo "<p><strong>Keyword: </strong>". $row->fld_keywords."</p>";
        echo "<p><strong>Explaination: </strong>".$row->fld_description."</p>";
        }
        break;
        default:
        break;
        
        }
        
        echo $response;
        }

Chakra Reading view

application/views/yogiccoach/chakra_reading.php 
<?php
$activeTab ="Chakrareading";
$memberName = "";
    $this->load->view('yogiccoach/sidebar');
    error_reporting(1);
    $session = $this->session->get_userdata();
    $login_id=$session['user_id'];
    
    /*Upload Chakra Images*/
$ChakraImagesStep = "1";
$ChakraImagesCount =0;

if(isset($_REQUEST["uploadChakraImages"])){
    $activeTab ="ChakraImages";
    if(!empty($_FILES['filename'])) {
        $error       = false;
        $ds          = DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR;
        $storeFolder = 'assets/uploads/chakra-reading/';
        
        $is_blank=true;
        $iname=array();

        for($i=0;$i<=8;$i++){
            if($_FILES['filename']['name'][$i]==''){
                $is_blank=true;
                 echo '<div class="alert alert-danger">Upload All Images, In Order To Submit This Page.</div>';
                 break;
            }else{
                $ChakraImagesCount++;
                $is_blank=false;
                continue;
            }
        }
        if(!$is_blank) {


            foreach ($_FILES["filename"]["name"] as $key => $name) {
                $tmp_name = $_FILES["filename"]["tmp_name"][$key];
                 $names = rand().$name;
                $iname[] = $names;
                $targetPath = FCPATH . $storeFolder . $ds;
                $targetFile = $targetPath . $names;
                $info = getimagesize($tmp_name);

            if ($info['mime'] == 'image/jpeg'){ 
                $image = imagecreatefromjpeg($tmp_name);

}
            elseif ($info['mime'] == 'image/gif') {
                $image = imagecreatefromgif($tmp_name);
            }

            elseif ($info['mime'] == 'image/png') {
                $image = imagecreatefrompng($tmp_name);
            }

            imagejpeg($image, $targetFile, 60);
                // move_uploaded_file($tmp_name,$targetFile);
           }


            $insetImage = array(
                'fld_user_id' => $user_id,
                'fld_image1' => $iname[0],
                'fld_image2' => $iname[1],
                'fld_image3' => $iname[2],
                'fld_image4' => $iname[3],
                'fld_image5' => $iname[4],
                'fld_image6' => $iname[5],
                'fld_image7' => $iname[6],
                'fld_image8' => $iname[7],
                'fld_image9' => $iname[8],
                'fld_added_date' => time()
            );
            $submit = $this->db->insert('chakra_reading', $insetImage);
            if ($this->db->affected_rows()) {
                // echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\"><strong>Success! </strong>.<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";
                    //Load email library
        // $this->load->library('email');
        // $this->email->from($member_coach_email, 'MyportalX');
        // $this->email->to($coach_admin_email);
        // $this->email->subject('Chakra Image Uploaded');
        // $this->email->message('Chakra Image Uploaded By'." ".$first_name." ".'Please Cheack-It-Out On MyportalX');
        //Send mail
        // if($this->email->send()){
                $email_html = '<head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=windows-1252"><meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001"></head><body bgcolor="#ffffff"><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong><table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4"><tr><td align="center" id="TdHeader" bgcolor="#400080"><p align="center"><font color="#ffffff" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="6"><strong>Welcome</strong></font></p></td></tr></table><table width="600" align="center" id="TbBodyRow" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tr><td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff"><table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4"><tr><td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left"><font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"><strong>Hi '. $coachname.'&nbsp;<font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">&nbsp;</font></strong></font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p align="justify" style="margin-right: 0px;"><font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"> Chakra Image Uploaded By'. $first_name. $last_name. ' Please Cheack-It-Out On MyportalX</font></p><br></font></font></font></p><p align="left"><br></p></td></tr></table></td></tr></table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong><table width="600" align="center" id="TbFooter" bgcolor="#eea000" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4"><tr><td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000"><div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span></div><div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Regards,</span><br style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"></span></div><div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;">Team MyportalX</span></div><div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></div></div></td></tr></table></body>';
                $subject = "Chakra Image Uploaded";
                $adminEmail = get_AdminEmailID();
                $revel = send_mail($coach_admin_email, $subject,$email_html,"",$member_coach_email);

                $notic=array(
            'sender_id' => $login_id,
            'reciver_id' => $user_id,
            'message' => 'Chakra Image Uploaded By'. $first_name. $last_name. ' Please Cheack-It-Out On MyportalX',
            'urls' => "chakra_reading",
            'fld_date' => time()
        );

        $this->db->insert('notification',$notic);
            echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\"><strong>Chakra Images Upload Successful!</strong>.<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";
        }else{
            echo '<div class="alert alert-danger">Please upload at least one image</div>';
        }

    }else{
//      echo '<div class="alert alert-danger">How did you do that?O_o</div>';
    }
}else{
    echo '<div class="alert alert-danger">Upload All Images, In Order To Submit This Page.</div>';
}
}
$imagePath = 'assets/uploads/chakra-reading/';
  
$defaultImages['fld_image1'] = $imagePath.'chakra_img01.jpg';
$defaultImages['fld_image2'] = $imagePath.'chakra_img02.jpg';
$defaultImages['fld_image3'] = $imagePath.'chakra_img03.jpg';
$defaultImages['fld_image4'] = $imagePath.'chakra_img04.jpg';
$defaultImages['fld_image5'] = $imagePath.'chakra_img05.jpg';
$defaultImages['fld_image6'] = $imagePath.'chakra_img06.jpg';
$defaultImages['fld_image7'] = $imagePath.'chakra_img07.jpg';
$defaultImages['fld_image8'] = $imagePath.'chakra_img08.jpg';
$defaultImages['fld_image9'] = $imagePath.'chakra_img09.jpg';
//get last process images uploaded by admin
$this->db->limit(1);
$this->db->order_by('fld_id','desc');
$processedImages = $this->db->get_where('admin_upload_chakra_reading',array('fld_user_id' =>$user_id))->result_array();
if(sizeof($processedImages)> 0)
    $processedImages = $processedImages[0];


//get last procssed images upload by User
$this->db->limit(1);
$this->db->order_by('fld_id','desc');
$userUploadedImages = $this->db->get_where('chakra_reading',array('fld_user_id' =>$user_id))->result_array();

if(sizeof($userUploadedImages)> 0)
    $userUploadedImages = $userUploadedImages[0];

if($processedImages['fld_added_date'] > $userUploadedImages['fld_added_date'] || sizeof( $userUploadedImages)==0){
        $imagePath = 'assets/uploads/admin_upload_chakra_reading/';
        $uploadedImages = $processedImages;
}
else{
        $uploadedImages = $userUploadedImages;
}

for($idx=1;$idx<=9;$idx++)
{
    if($uploadedImages['fld_image'.$idx] =='')
        $uploadedImages['fld_image'.$idx] = $defaultImages['fld_image'.$idx];
    else
         $uploadedImages['fld_image'.$idx] =  $imagePath . $uploadedImages['fld_image'.$idx];
        
}

$number = $this->db->get_where('yogi_notes',array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id))->result();

    $row_cont=1;
    $catRow='';
    foreach ($number as $Row){
        $catRow.='<tr class="gradeA" id="trnote_'.$Row->fld_id.'">
                        <td>'.$row_cont.'</td>
                        <td>'.$Row->fld_section.'</td>
                        <td>'.$Row->fld_notes_number.'</td>
                        <td>'.nl2br($Row->fld_notes).'</td>
                        <td class="text-center"><a href="javascript:void(0)" style="color:red" class="rmnotes" data-id="'.$Row->fld_id.'" client-id="'.$Row->fld_user_id.'"><i class="glyphicon glyphicon-remove"></i></a></td>
                </tr>';
        $row_cont++;
    }
?>

        padding: 0px;
    }

                                            ->from('chakra_reading')
                                            ->where(array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id))
                                            ->order_by('fld_added_date',desc)
                                            ->limit(1);
                                        $subquery = $this->db->get();

                                        $chakra=$subquery->result();
                                        $this->db->select('*')
                                            ->from('admin_upload_chakra_reading')
                                            ->where(array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id))
                                            ->order_by('fld_added_date',desc)
                                            ->limit(1);
                                        $subquery1 = $this->db->get();

                                                $chakre_image_path='assets/uploads/chakra-reading/';

                                                                                    id="chakra_major_details"
                                                                                    style="padding:10px;"></div>
                                                                                <div class="col-md-12">
                                                                                    <label>Notes </label></br>
                                                                                    <textarea rows="4" cols="40"
                                                                                        name="chakra_major_notes"
                                                                                        id="chakra_major_notes"
                                                                                        class="form-control"
                                                                                        required></textarea>
                                                                                    <div class="pull-right"
                                                                                        style="padding:5px">

                                                                                            data-id="<?php echo $user_id;?>"
                                                                                            data-section="major">Add
                                                                                            Notes</button>

                                                                                </div>

                                        {

        <script>
            $(document).ready(function () {
                // $("#uploadChakraImages").click(function(){
                //  $('#chakraup').click();
                //        var cid = $(this).attr("data-id");
                //        var image1 = $("#fld_image1").attr("src");
                //        var image2 = $("#fld_image2").attr("src");
                //        var image3 = $("#fld_image3").attr("src");
                //        var image4 = $("#fld_image4").attr("src");
                //        var image5 = $("#fld_image5").attr("src");
                //        var image6 = $("#fld_image6").attr("src");
                //        var image7 = $("#fld_image7").attr("src");
                //        var image8 = $("#fld_image8").attr("src");
                //        var image9 = $("#fld_image9").attr("src");
                //        $.ajax({
                //            type:"post",
                //            url:"<?= base_url('yogiccoach/admins_upload_chakra/')?>",
                //            data:{image1:image1,image2:image2,image3:image3,image4:image4,image5:image5,image6:image6,image7:image7,image8:image8,image9:image9,cid:cid},
                //            dataType:"json",
                //            success:function(response){
                //                if (response.status == '1') {
                //  $("#successmsg").html("<div class=\"alert alert-success\"><strong>Success! </strong>.<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>");

                // } else {
                //  $("successmsg").html("<div class=\"alert alert-danger\"><strong>some thing error!</strong>.<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>");
