                $("#uploadChakraImagesclient").click(function () {
                    var cid = $(this).attr("data-id");
                    var image1 = $("#fld_image1").attr("src");
                    var image2 = $("#fld_image2").attr("src");
                    var image3 = $("#fld_image3").attr("src");
                    var image4 = $("#fld_image4").attr("src");
                    var image5 = $("#fld_image5").attr("src");
                    var image6 = $("#fld_image6").attr("src");
                    var image7 = $("#fld_image7").attr("src");
                    var image8 = $("#fld_image8").attr("src");
                    var image9 = $("#fld_image9").attr("src");
                    $.ajax({
                        type: "post",
                        url: "<?= base_url('yogiccoach/client_upload_chakra/')?>",
                        data: { image1: image1, image2: image2, image3: image3, image4: image4, image5: image5, image6: image6, image7: image7, image8: image8, image9: image9, cid: cid },
                        dataType: "json",
                        success: function (response) {
                            if (response.status == '1') {
                                $("#successmsg").html("<div class=\"alert alert-success\"><strong>Success! </strong>.<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>");

                            } else {
                                $("successmsg").html("<div class=\"alert alert-danger\"><strong>some thing error!</strong>.<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>");
                            }
                        },
                    });
                });
            });
        </script>
        <script>
            var home_url = "<?= base_url() ?>";
            $(document).ready(function () {
                load_data();
                function load_data(query) {
                    $.ajax({
                        type: "POST",
                        url: "<?= base_url() ?>yogiccoach/search_option_chakra/",
                        data: {
                            keyword: $("#search_option").val()
                        },
                        dataType: "json",
                        success: function (data) {
                            if (data.length > 0) {
                                $('#DropdownCountry').empty();
                                $('#search_option').attr("data-toggle", "dropdown");
                                $('#DropdownCountry').dropdown('toggle');
                            }
                            else if (data.length == 0) {
                                $('#search_option').attr("data-toggle", "");
                            }
                            $.each(data, function (key, value) {
                                if (data.length >= 0)
                                    $('#DropdownCountry').append('<option value="' + value["fld_id"] + '">' + value['fld_position'] + '</option>');
                            });
                            allow = true;
                            // $('#search_option')focus();
                        }
                    });
                }

                $("#search_option").keyup(function () {
                    var search = $(this).val();
                    if (search != '') {
                        load_data(search);
                    }
                    else {
                        load_data();
                    }
                });

                $('.txtsearch_option').click(function () {
                    // $('#search_option').val($(this).text());
                });
            });
        </script>
        <script>
            $(document).ready(function () {
                $.ajax({
                    url: "<?php echo base_url(); ?>yogiccoach/delet_chakra_notifiction/<?php echo $user_id ?>",
                    success: function (result) {
                    }
                });
            });
        </script>
        <script>
            $(document).ready(function () {
                $(".alert-danger").fadeOut(8000);
                setActiveTab("<?php echo $activeTab;?>");
                $('#fronttorso').glassCase();

                $(".add_chakra_notes").click(function () {
                    var cid = $(this).attr("data-id");
                    var sec = $(this).attr("data-section");
                    var id = "";
                    var opt = "";
                    var notes = "";
                    var seltext = "";
                    var notesobj = $("#chakra_" + sec + "_notes");
                    if (sec == "minor") {
                        sec = "Minor";
                        id = $("#chakra_minor_pos option:selected").val();
                        seltext = $("#chakra_minor_pos option:selected").text();
                        opt = $("#chakra_minor_direction:checked").val();
                        notes = $("#chakra_minor_notes").val();
                    } else if (sec == "major") {
                        sec = "Major";
                        id = $("#chakra_major_movement option:selected").val();
                        seltext = $("#chakra_major_movement option:selected").text();
                        opt = $("#chakra_major_movement_position:checked").val();
                        notes = $("#chakra_major_notes").val();
                    } else if (sec == "aura") {
                        sec = "Aura";
                        id = $("#select_chakra_aura option:selected").val();
                        seltext = $("#select_chakra_aura option:selected").text();
                        opt = "";
                        notes = $("#chakra_aura_notes").val();
                    }
                    if ($.trim(id) == "0") {
                        alert("Please select option from dropdown");
                        return false;
                    }
                    else if ($.trim(notes) == "") {
                        alert("Please enter your notes");
                        return false;
                    }
                    if (cid != "" && sec != "" && id != "" && notes != "") {
                        var pos = "";
                        if (opt != "")
                            pos = seltext + " (" + opt + ")";
                        else
                            pos = seltext;
                        $.ajax({
                            url: "<?= base_url() ?>/yogiccoach/add_chakra_reading_notes",
                            data: { "cid": cid, "sec": sec, "no": pos, "notes": notes },
                            dataType: "json",
                            type: "POST",
                            success: function (response) {
                                if (response.status == '1') {
                                    $(notesobj).val("");
                                    $(notesobj).focus();
                                    $("#tbnotes tbody").html(response.data);

                                } else {
                                    alert(response.message);
                                }
                            }
                        });
                    }
                });

                $("#add_chakra_major_notes").click(function () {
                    //chakra_aura_notes
                    //chakra_aura
                });

                $("#add_chakra_minor_notes").click(function () {
                    var cid = $(this).attr('data-id');
                    var no = $("#noid").html();
                    var notes = $("#reading_notes").val();

                    if (isNaN(no) || $.trim(no) == "") {
                        $("#noid").css("color", "red");
                        $("#noid").html("Required");
                        return false;
                    }
                    else if ($.trim(notes) == "") {
                        $("#lblnotes").css("color", "red");
                        $("#lblnotes").html("Required");
                        return false;
                    }
                    $.ajax({
                        url: "<?= base_url(); ?>yogiccoach/add_chakra_reading_notes",
                        data: { "cid": cid, "no": no, "notes": notes },
                        dataType: "json",
                        type: "POST",
                        success: function (response) {
                            if (response.status == '1') {
                                $("#no").val("");
                                $("#noid").html("");
                                $("#reading_notes").val("");
                                $("#no").focus();
                                $("#tbnotes tbody").html(response.data);

                            } else {
                                alert(response.message);
                            }
                        }
                    });
                });

                $(".downloadwolnotes").click(function () {
                    var cid = $(this).attr('data-id');
                    url = "<?= base_url() ?>yogiccoach/download_chakra_reading_notes/" + cid;
                    window.location.assign(url);
                    //$("#tbnotes tbody").html("");
                });

                $(".rmnotes").click(function () {
                    if (confirm("Are you sure?")) {
                        var id = $(this).attr('data-id');
                        var cid = $(this).attr('client-id');
                        $.get("<?= base_url() ?>yogiccoach/delete_chakra_reading_notes", { "id": id, "cid": cid }, function (response) {
                            if (response = "success") {
                                console.log(response);
                                $("#trnote_" + id).hide(300);
                            }
                            else {

                            }
                        });
                    }
                });

                sendreport = function (obj) {
                    var recid = $(obj).attr('data-id');
                    var mod = $(obj).attr('data-name');
                    $.get("<?= base_url() ?>yogiccoach/get_client_report/" + recid + "/" +<? php echo $user_id;?> +"/" + mod + "/send", "", function (response) {
                        if (response = "sent") {
                            $('#error_container').html('<div class="alert alert-success fade in"><strong>Success!</strong>Mail has been sent.</div>').show();
                            $("#error_container").show().delay(3000).queue(function (n) {
                                //$(obj).hide();
                            });
                        }
                        else {
                            $('#error_container').html('<div class="alert alert-warning fade in"><strong></strong> ' + response + '</div>').show();
                            $("#error_container").show().delay(3000).queue(function (n) {
                                //$(this).hide();
                            });
                        }

                    });
};

            sendforgot = function (obj) {
                var recid = $(obj).attr('data-id');
                $.get("<?= base_url() ?>yogiccoach/forgot_user_password/" +<? php echo $user_id;?>, "", function (response) {
                    console.log(response);
                    if (response = "sent") {
                        $('#pwdpass').html('<div class="alert alert-success fade in">Mail has been sent.</div>').show();
                        $("#pwdpass").fadeOut(3000);
                    }
                    else {
                        $('#pwdpass').html('<div class="alert alert-warning fade in"><strong></strong> ' + response + '</div>').show();
                        $("#pwdpass").show().delay(3000).queue(function (n) {
                            //$(this).hide();
                        });
                    }

                });
            };

            sendnotes = function (obj) {
                var recid = $(obj).attr('data-id');
                $.get("<?= base_url() ?>yogiccoach/send_chakra_reading_notes/" +<? php echo $user_id;?>, "", function (response) {
                    if (response = "sent") {
                        $('#notes_send_message').html('<div class="alert alert-success fade in">Mail has been sent.</div>').show();
                        $("#notes_send_message").fadeOut(3000);
                    }
                    else {
                        $('#notes_send_message').html('<div class="alert alert-warning fade in"><strong></strong> ' + response + '</div>').show();
                        $("#notes_send_message").show().delay(3000).queue(function (n) {
                            //$(this).hide();
                        });
                    }

                });
            };
});


            function get_chakra_section_details(section, id, opt, obj) {
                $("#" + obj).html("Loading...");
                $.get("<?= base_url() ?>/yogiccoach/get_chakra_section_details/" + section + "/" + id + "/" + opt,
                    function (response) {
                        $("#" + obj).html(response);
                    }
                );
            }

            function setActiveTab($tabid) {
                if ($('.nav-tabs a[href="#tab' + $tabid + '"]').attr('data-toggle'))
                    $('.nav-tabs a[href="#tab' + $tabid + '"]').click();
                else
                    $('.nav-tabs a[href="#tabChecklist"]').click();
            }
        </script>
        <script>
            $(document).ready(function () {
                $('#get_logout').click(function () {
                    var username = $(this).attr('username');
                    $.ajax({
                        url: "<?=base_url()?>get_logout",
                        data: {
                            "username": username
                        },
                        dataType: "json",
                        type: "POST",
                        success: function (response) {

                            if (response.status == '1') {
                                window.setTimeout(function () {
                                    // Move to a new location or you can do something else
                                    window.location.href = "<?=base_url()?>login";
                                }, 0000);
                            } else {
                            }
                        }
                    });
                });
            });
        </script>
        <div class="message-box animated fadeIn" data-sound="alert" id="mb-signout">
            <div class="mb-container">
                <div class="mb-middle">
                    <div class="mb-title"><span class="fa fa-sign-out"></span> Log <strong>Out</strong> ?</div>
                    <div class="mb-content">
                        <p>Are you sure you want to log out?</p>
                        <p>Press No if you want to continue work. Press Yes to logout current user.</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="mb-footer">
                        <div class="pull-right">
                            <a href="#" id="get_logout" username="<?php echo $session['username']; ?>"
                                class="btn btn-success btn-lg">Yes</a>
                            <button class="btn btn-default btn-lg mb-control-close">No</button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <script>
                <? php $this -> load -> view('yogiccoach/footer'); ?>

client profile edit



client profile edit Controller

application/controllers/yogiccoach.php 
public function client_profile_setting($user_id=''){
		if (isset($_POST['submit'])) 
		{
			$fld_username = $_POST['fld_username'];
			$fld_email = $_POST['fld_email'];
			$fld_start_date = $_POST['fld_start_date'];
			$fld_end_date = $_POST['fld_end_date'];
			$fld_first_name = $_POST['fld_first_name'];
			$fld_last_name = $_POST['fld_last_name'];
			$fld_location = $_POST['fld_location'];
			$fld_timezone = $_POST['timezones'];
			$fld_phone = $_POST['fld_phone'];
			$fld_about_me = $_POST['fld_about_me'];
			$fld_id = $_POST['fld_id'];

			$data = array(
				'fld_username' => $fld_username,
				'fld_email' => $fld_email,
				'fld_start_date' => $fld_start_date,
				'fld_end_date' => $fld_end_date,
				'fld_first_name' => $fld_first_name,
				'fld_last_name' => $fld_last_name,
				'fld_location' => $fld_location,
				'fld_timezone' => $fld_timezone,
				'fld_phone' => $fld_phone,
				'fld_about_me' => $fld_about_me,				
			);
			$this->db->where(array('fld_id' => $fld_id));
                    $this->db->update('users',$data);  
                    echo "<div   class=\"alert alert-success\"> Client Profile Updated Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";
		}
		if($this->isAuthorized($user_id)){
			$data = array();
			$data['user_id']=$user_id;
			$this->load->view('yogiccoach/client_profile_setting',$data);
		}
	}
    public function forgot_user_password($clientID)
   {
   	$clientDetails = $this->db->get_where("users", array("fld_id"=>$clientID),1,0);
		if($clientDetails->num_rows()){
			$clientDetails = $clientDetails->row();
			$clientName = $clientDetails->fld_first_name.' '.$clientDetails->fld_last_name;
            $clientEmail= $clientDetails->fld_email;
            $fld_parent=$clientDetails->fld_parent;
            $fld_rand_code = $clientDetails->fld_rand_code;
        }
        $admin=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$fld_parent));
        if ($admin->num_rows()>0) {
        $row=$admin->row_array();

        $adminName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        $adminemail = $row["fld_email"];
        }
				 $message="<table width='600' align='center' id='TbHeader' bgcolor='#400080' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'><tr><td align='center' id='TdHeader' bgcolor='#400080'><p align='center'><font color='#ffffff' face='Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='6'><strong>Welcome</strong></font></p></td></tr></table><table width='600' align='center' id='TbBodyRow' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0'><tr><td id='TdBodyRow' valign='top' bgcolor='#ffffff'><table width='100%' id='TbBody' bgcolor='#ffffff' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'><tr><td align='center' id='TdBody' bgcolor='#ffffff'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align='left'><font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>Hi ".$clientName."<br><br>Your coach ".$adminName." recently requested to reset the password for your MyportalX account. Click on the link below to reset your password.<br><br><a style='background:#33b5e5;color:#ffffff;border:none;border-radius:5px;padding:5px 10px;text-decoration:none' href='".base_url('Registration/forgot_password/'.$fld_rand_code)."'> RESET PASSWORD </a><br><br>If you/your coach didn't requested a password reset you can safely ignore this email or contact us immediately at support@myportalx.com&nbsp;<font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'>&nbsp;</font></font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p align='justify' style='margin-right: 0px;'><font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'></font><p align='justify' style='margin-right: 0px;'><font color='#000000' face='Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' size='3'><br></font></p></p></td></tr></table></td></tr></table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong></strong><table width='600' align='center' id='TbFooter' bgcolor='#eea000' border='0' cellspacing='0' cellpadding='4'><tr><td align='center' id='TdFooter' bgcolor='#eea000'><div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span></span></div><div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;'>Regards,</span><br style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'></span></div><div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'>Team MyportalX</span></div><div style='margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);'><span style='color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;'><br></span></div></div></td></tr></table>";
                 $subject = "Password Reset";
				 $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
				 $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
				 $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
			     $retval = mail($clientEmail,$subject,$message,$header);
               
               	 $response_message="sent";
 
   }

client profile edit view

application/views/yogiccoach/client_profile_setting.php 
<?php
$this->load->view('yogiccoach/sidebar');
	error_reporting(1);
	$session = $this->session->get_userdata();
	$login_id=$session['user_id'];

	$user=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));
	if ($user->num_rows()>0) {
		$row=$user->row_array();

		$memberName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
		$memberStatus = $row["fld_status"];
		$memberemail = $row["fld_email"];
		$marketing_form = $row['fld_marketing'];
	}
	// image path.....
	$image_path=($row['fld_file_name']!='')?$row['fld_file_name']:'assets/uploads/member/default.png';
	$image = base_url().$image_path;

	// 1  client_history table.....https://www.myportalx.com/tool/assets/uploads/member/default.png
	$this->db->order_by('fld_id','desc');
	$client_history =$this->db->get_where('client_history',array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id));
	if ($client_history->num_rows()>0) {
		$clientHistory=$client_history->row_array();
	}

	$microsoftWindowsTimeZones = [

                              else
                              {
                                $selected = '';

<script>
	sendforgot = function (obj) {
			var recid = $(obj).attr('data-id');
			$.get(home_url + "yogiccoach/forgot_user_password/"+<?php echo $user_id;?>,"", function (response) {
				console.log(response);
				if (response = "sent") {
					$('#pwdpass').html('<div class="alert alert-success fade in">An Email For Password Recovery Is Sent To Client\'s Email Id</div>').show();
					$("#pwdpass").fadeOut(3000);
				}
				else {
					$('#pwdpass').html('<div class="alert alert-warning fade in"><strong></strong> ' + response + '</div>').show();
					$("#pwdpass").show().delay(3000).queue(function (n) {
						//$(this).hide();
					});
				}

			});
		};
            </script>
<?php $this->load->view('yogiccoach/footer'); ?>

Client Library



Client Library Controller

application/controllers/yogiccoach.php 
public function library($user_id = ''){
$data['user_id']=$user_id;
$this->load->view('yogiccoach/library',$data);
}

Client Library view

application/views/yogiccoach/library.php 
<?php $this->load->view('yogiccoach/sidebar'); 
// 	$user_id=$fld_id;
?>
<!-- START BREADCRUMB -->
<ul class="breadcrumb">
    <li><a href="<?php echo base_url()." yogiccoach"; ?>">Home</a></li>
    <li class="active">Library</li>
</ul>
<!-- END BREADCRUMB -->

<!-- PAGE CONTENT WRAPPER -->
<div class="page-content-wrap">

    <!-- PAGE TITLE -->
    <div class="page-content-wrap">
        <!-- <h2>&nbsp;  <?= $files ?></h2> -->
    </div>

    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-12">
            <div class="card-box">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="col-lg-6 col-xl-6">
                        <h4 class="header-title m-b-30">My Files</h4>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="row">

                    <?php
                    $userData = $this->db->query("SELECT * FROM `library` WHERE `client_id`= '$user_id'");
$files = '';
foreach ($userData->result() as $ListRow){
    $file = $ListRow->folder_name;
    $data = explode(".", $file);
    $extension = $data[1];
switch ($extension) {
   case "zip":
     $paths = "https://coderthemes.com/highdmin/layouts/assets/images/file_icons/zip.svg";
     break;
     case "pdf":
     $paths = "https://coderthemes.com/highdmin/layouts/assets/images/file_icons/pdf.svg";
     break;
     case "txt":
     $paths = "https://coderthemes.com/highdmin/layouts/assets/images/file_icons/txt.svg";
     break;
     default:
     $paths = base_url('library/'.$file);
 } 
 $data = explode("/", $file);
 $extension = $data[1]; 
                     ?>
                    <div class="col-lg-3 col-xl-2">
                        <div class="file-man-box">
                            <div class="file-img-box"><img src="<?= $paths ?>" alt="icon" width="100"></div><a
                                href="<?= base_url('library/'.$file) ?>" class="file-download" download><i
                                    class="fa fa-download"></i></a>
                            <div class="file-man-title">
                                <h5 class="mb-0 text-overflow">
                                    <?php echo $extension?>
                                </h5>
                                <p class="mb-0"><small></small></p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <?php } ?>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <?php $this->load->view('yogiccoach/footer'); ?>

DAS measure change



DAS measure change Controller

application/controllers/yogiccoach.php 
public function das_measure($user_id='')
{
$data['user_id']=$user_id;
$this->load->view('yogiccoach/das_measure',$data);
}

DAS measure change view

application/views/yogiccoach/das_measure.php 
<?php 
$this->load->view('yogiccoach/sidebar');
    error_reporting(1);
    $session = $this->session->get_userdata();
    $login_id=$session['user_id'];
    $row = array();

    if (isset($_POST['submit_change'])) {
        $fld_production = $_POST['fld_production'];
        $fld_production1 = $_POST['fld_production1'];
        $fld_production2 = $_POST['fld_production2'];
        $fld_production3 = $_POST['fld_production3'];
        $fld_production4 = $_POST['fld_production4'];
        $fld_production5 = $_POST['fld_production5'];
        $fld_production6 = $_POST['fld_production6'];
        $fld_production7 = $_POST['fld_production7'];
        $fld_production8 = $_POST['fld_production8'];
        $fld_production9 = $_POST['fld_production9'];
        $fld_coach = $_POST['fld_coach'];
        $fld_member_id = $_POST['fld_member_id'];
        $fld_info = $_POST['fld_info'];
        $fld_info1 = $_POST['fld_info1'];
        $fld_info2 = $_POST['fld_info2'];
        $fld_info3 = $_POST['fld_info3'];
        $fld_info4 = $_POST['fld_info4'];
        $fld_info5 = $_POST['fld_info5'];
        $fld_info6 = $_POST['fld_info6'];
        $fld_info7 = $_POST['fld_info7'];
        $fld_info8 = $_POST['fld_info8'];
        $fld_info9 = $_POST['fld_info9'];

     $data =array(
        'fld_coach' => $fld_coach,
        'fld_member_id' => $fld_member_id,
        'fld_production'=>$fld_production,
        'fld_production1'=>$fld_production1,
        'fld_production2'=>$fld_production2,
        'fld_production3'=>$fld_production3,
        'fld_production4'=>$fld_production4,
        'fld_production5'=>$fld_production5,
        'fld_production6'=>$fld_production6,
        'fld_production7'=>$fld_production7,
        'fld_production8'=>$fld_production8,
        'fld_production9'=>$fld_production9,
        'fld_info' => $fld_info,
        'fld_info1' => $fld_info1,
        'fld_info2' => $fld_info2,
        'fld_info3' => $fld_info3,
        'fld_info4' => $fld_info4,
        'fld_info5' => $fld_info5,
        'fld_info6' => $fld_info6,
        'fld_info7' => $fld_info7,
        'fld_info8' => $fld_info8,
        'fld_info9' => $fld_info9,
     ); 

     $datas = $this->db->insert('das',$data);
     if($datas){
        echo "<div   class=\"alert alert-success\">DAS Edited Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";;
     }
    }

    if (isset($_POST['update_change'])) {
        $fld_production = $_POST['fld_production'];
        $fld_production1 = $_POST['fld_production1'];
        $fld_production2 = $_POST['fld_production2'];
        $fld_production3 = $_POST['fld_production3'];
        $fld_production4 = $_POST['fld_production4'];
        $fld_production5 = $_POST['fld_production5'];
        $fld_production6 = $_POST['fld_production6'];
        $fld_production7 = $_POST['fld_production7'];
        $fld_production8 = $_POST['fld_production8'];
        $fld_production9 = $_POST['fld_production9'];
        $fld_coach = $_POST['fld_coach'];
        $fld_member_id = $_POST['fld_member_id'];
        $fld_info = $_POST['fld_info'];
        $fld_info1 = $_POST['fld_info1'];
        $fld_info2 = $_POST['fld_info2'];
        $fld_info3 = $_POST['fld_info3'];
        $fld_info4 = $_POST['fld_info4'];
        $fld_info5 = $_POST['fld_info5'];
        $fld_info6 = $_POST['fld_info6'];
        $fld_info7 = $_POST['fld_info7'];
        $fld_info8 = $_POST['fld_info8'];
        $fld_info9 = $_POST['fld_info9'];

     $data =array(
        'fld_production'=>$fld_production,
        'fld_production1'=>$fld_production1,
        'fld_production2'=>$fld_production2,
        'fld_production3'=>$fld_production3,
        'fld_production4'=>$fld_production4,
        'fld_production5'=>$fld_production5,
        'fld_production6'=>$fld_production6,
        'fld_production7'=>$fld_production7,
        'fld_production8'=>$fld_production8,
        'fld_production9'=>$fld_production9,
        'fld_info' => $fld_info,
        'fld_info1' => $fld_info1,
        'fld_info2' => $fld_info2,
        'fld_info3' => $fld_info3,
        'fld_info4' => $fld_info4,
        'fld_info5' => $fld_info5,
        'fld_info6' => $fld_info6,
        'fld_info7' => $fld_info7,
        'fld_info8' => $fld_info8,
        'fld_info9' => $fld_info9,
     );

     $this->db->where('fld_coach',$fld_coach);
     $this->db->where('fld_member_id', $fld_member_id);
    $datas = $this->db->update('das', $data);
    if($datas){
        echo "<div   class=\"alert alert-success\">DAS Edited Successfully!<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";;
     }
    }
?>
<div class="panel panel-default">
    <div class="panel-body">
        <h3 class="push-down-0">DAS - Measure Today's Production</h3>
    </div>
    <!-- END BREADCRUMB -->
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-md-12">
            <div class="panel panel-default" style="padding: 50px; height: auto;">
                <?php
    		$das_score = $this->db->get_where('das',array('fld_coach'=>$login_id,'fld_member_id'=>$user_id));
    			if ($das_score->num_rows() != 0) { 
    				$row = $das_score->row_array();
    				?>

Client Summery Notes



Client Summery Notes Controller

application/controllers/yogiccoach.php 
public function session_notes($user_id=''){
$data = array();
$data['user_id']=$user_id;
$this->load->view('yogiccoach/session_notes',$data);
}
public function add_history_notes(){
        $response['status'] = 0;
		$response['message'] = 'Required data missing';
		$response['data'] = "";
      if($this->input->post())
	   {
        $clientID = $this->input->post('cid');
		$topic=$this->input->post('topic');
		$details=$this->input->post('notes');
		$date = $this->input->post('date');
		$planDATA=array(
			'fld_yogi_id'=>$this->userid,
			'fld_member_id'=>$clientID,
			'fld_member_name'=>'',
			'fld_select_date'=>$date,
			'fld_topic'=>$topic,
			'fld_details'=>$details,
			'fld_added_date'=>time()
		);
           
	    $this->db->insert('yogi_history',$planDATA);
		if($this->db->affected_rows())
		{
            $response['status'] = 1;
			$response['message'] = 'Notes added.';
			$listView = "";
            $historyMember=$this->Common_model->get_table_records('yogi_history',array('fld_member_id'=>$clientID));
            foreach($historyMember as $history){
               $listView.='<tr>
                            <td width="100px">'.date("m/d/Y",strtotime($history->fld_select_date)).'</td>
                            <td width="100px" class="topic"><strong>'.$history->fld_topic.'</strong></td>
                            <td width="500px">'.nl2br($history->fld_details).'</td>
                            <td width="90px">
                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="btn btn-info btn-sm item_edit" data-details="'.nl2br($history->fld_details).'" data-topic="'.$history->fld_topic.'" data-id="'.$history->fld_id.'" data-date="'.date("m/d/Y",strtotime($history->fld_select_date)).'">Edit</a>
                            <td width="90px"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm item_delete" data-id="'.$history->fld_id.'">Delete</a></td>
                        </tr>';
            }
            $response['data'] = $listView;
		}
		else
		{
			 $response['status'] = 0;
			 $response['message'] = 'Error while adding notes.';
            $response['data'] ="";
		}
	}
        
	 echo json_encode($response);
    }
    public function edit_history_notes(){
    $topic=$this->input->post('topic');
    $details=$this->input->post('details');
    $date=$this->input->post('date');
    $history_id=$this->input->post('history_id');
    
    $this->db->set('fld_details', $details);
    $this->db->set('fld_select_date', $date);
    $this->db->set('fld_topic', $topic);
    $this->db->where('fld_id', $history_id);
    $result=$this->db->update('yogi_history');
    return $result;
    }

Client Summery Notes view

application/views/yogiccoach/session_notes.php 
<?php 
$this->load->view('yogiccoach/sidebar');
	error_reporting(1);
	$session = $this->session->get_userdata();
	$login_id=$session['user_id'];

$user=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));
	if ($user->num_rows()>0) {
		$row=$user->row_array();
		$memberName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
        if(trim($memberName) == "")
            $memberName = $row["fld_username"];
		$memberStatus = $row["fld_status"];
		$memberemail = $row["fld_email"];
		$marketing_form = $row['fld_marketing'];
        $coach_id = $row['fld_parent'];
	}
	$this->db->order_by('fld_id','desc');
	$client_history =$this->db->get_where('client_history',array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id));
	if ($client_history->num_rows()>0) {
		$clientHistory=$client_history->row_array();
	}
?>

<div class="col-md-12">
    <div class="panel panel-default">
        <div class="panel-heading">
            <h3 class="panel-title">Client Summary Notes (
                <?= ucfirst($memberName);?> )
            </h3>
        </div>
        <a class="btn btn-primary" style="float: right; margin: 50px 50px 0; "
            href="<?= base_url('yogiccoach/session_notes1/').'/'.$coach_id ?>">Notes For Self</a>
        <div class="panel-body">
            <form class="form-horizontal">
                <div class="form-group">
                    <label class="col-md-3 col-xs-12 control-label">Select Date</label>
                    <div class="col-md-6 col-xs-12">
                        <div class="input-group">
                            <span class="input-group-addon"><span class="fa fa-calendar"></span></span>
                            <!--<input type="text" class="form-control datepicker" name="dateSlected" required>-->
                            <input type="date" class="form-control" required id="date_history" value="<?php echo date("
                                Y-m-d");?>" style="width:200px;color: #000;">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="form-group">
                    <label class="col-md-3 col-xs-12 control-label">Topic :</label>
                    <div class="col-md-6 col-xs-12">
                        <select class="form-control" id="ddlHistoryTopic" name="ddlHistoryTopic">
                            <option value="">Select Topic</option>
                            <option value="Physical">Physical</option>
                            <option value="Emotional">Emotional (Overall feeling towards life and environment)</option>
                            <option value="Mental">Mental (Dominating thoughts on regular basis)</option>
                            <option value="Self Worth">Self Worth (Self talk-performance ability)</option>
                            <option value="Financial">Financial</option>
                            <option value="Social">Social</option>
                            <option value="Family">Family (Parents, Kids, Siblings)</option>
                            <option value="Spouse">Spouse (Romantic relationship)</option>
                            <option value="Spiritual">Spiritual</option>
                            <option value="Growth">Growth</option>
                        </select>
                    </div>
                    <button type="button" data-toggle="modal" data-target="#myModal"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i></button>
                </div>

                <div class="form-group">
                    <label class="col-md-3 col-xs-12 control-label">Notes</label>
                    <div class="col-md-6 col-xs-12">
                        <textarea name="historyNotes" id="historyNotes" class="form-control" rows="5"></textarea>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="form-group">
                    <div class="col-md-6 col-xs-12">
                        <button id="addHistory" type="button" class="btn btn-primary pull-right"
                            data-id="<?php echo $user_id;?>">Add Notes</button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </form>
        </div>
        <!------------------------------------------------------------------->
        <div class="panel-body">
            <table class="table table-striped table-bordered" width="100%">
                <tr>
                    <th width="110px">Dated</th>
                    <th width="110px">Topic</th>
                    <th width="500px">Notes</th>
                    <th width="100px">Edit</th>
                    <th width="100px">Delete</th>
                </tr>

                <?php
                    $historyMember=$this->Common_model->get_table_records('yogi_history',array('fld_member_id'=>$user_id));
                    foreach($historyMember as $history){
                          $listView.='<tr>
                            <td width="100px">'.date("m/d/Y",strtotime($history->fld_select_date)).'</td>
                            <td width="100px" class="topic"><strong>'.$history->fld_topic.'</strong></td>
                            <td width="500px">'.nl2br($history->fld_details).'</td>
                            <td width="90px">
                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="btn btn-info btn-sm item_edit" data-details="'.nl2br($history->fld_details).'" data-topic="'.$history->fld_topic.'" data-id="'.$history->fld_id.'" data-date="'.date("m/d/Y",strtotime($history->fld_select_date)).'">Edit</a>
                            <td width="90px"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm item_delete" data-id="'.$history->fld_id.'">Delete</a></td>
                        </tr>';
                }

                    ?>
                <tr>
                    <td colspan="5" style="padding:0">
                        <div class="scroll_div">
                            <table class="table table-striped table-bordered" style="padding:0" id="tbHistoryNotes">
                                <?php echo $listView; ?>
                            </table>

                        </div>
                    </td>
                </tr>
            </table>
        </div>
        <!------------------------------------------------------------------->
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<!-- edite notes -->
<div id="Modal_Edit" class="modal fade" role="dialog">
    <div class="modal-dialog">

        <!-- Modal content-->
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</button>

            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                <form class="form-horizontal">
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label class="col-md-3 col-xs-12 control-label">Select Date</label>
                        <div class="col-md-6 col-xs-12">
                            <div class="input-group">
                                <span class="input-group-addon"><span class="fa fa-calendar"></span></span>
                                <!--<input type="text" class="form-control datepicker" name="dateSlected" required>-->
                                <input type="text" class="form-control" required id="date_his"
                                    style="width:200px;color: #000;">
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label class="col-md-3 col-xs-12 control-label">Topic :</label>
                        <div class="col-md-6 col-xs-12">
                            <select class="form-control" id="History_Topic" name="ddlHistoryTopic">
                                <option value="">Select Topic</option>
                                <option value="Physical">Physical</option>
                                <option value="Emotional">Emotional (Overall feeling towards life and environment)
                                </option>
                                <option value="Mental">Mental (Dominating thoughts on regular basis)</option>
                                <option value="Self Worth">Self Worth (Self talk-performance ability)</option>
                                <option value="Financial">Financial</option>
                                <option value="Social">Social</option>
                                <option value="Family">Family (Parents, Kids, Siblings)</option>
                                <option value="Spouse">Spouse (Romantic relationship)</option>
                                <option value="Spiritual">Spiritual</option>
                                <option value="Growth">Growth</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                        <button type="button" data-toggle="modal" data-target="#myModal2"><i
                                class="fa fa-plus"></i></button>
                    </div>

                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label class="col-md-3 col-xs-12 control-label">Notes</label>
                        <div class="col-md-6 col-xs-12">
                            <textarea name="historyNotes" id="history_Notes" class="form-control" rows="5"></textarea>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <div class="col-md-6 col-xs-12">
                            <button id="btn_update" type="button" class="btn btn-primary pull-right"
                                data-dismiss="modal">Add Notes</button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </form>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-default" data-dismiss="modal">Close</button>
            </div>
        </div>

    </div>
</div>

<!-- Modal -->
<div id="myModal" class="modal fade" role="dialog">
    <div class="modal-dialog">

        <!-- Modal content-->
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</button>
                <h4 class="modal-title">Add new Topic</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                <input type="text" id="addtopic">
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="myFunction()" data-dismiss="modal">Add</button>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-default" data-dismiss="modal">Close</button>
            </div>
        </div>

    </div>
</div>

<!-- Modal -->
<div id="myModal2" class="modal fade" role="dialog">
    <div class="modal-dialog">

        <!-- Modal content-->
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">&times;</button>
                <h4 class="modal-title">Add new Topic</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                <input type="text" id="addtopics">
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="myFunctions()" data-dismiss="modal">Add</button>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-default" data-dismiss="modal">Close</button>
            </div>
        </div>

    </div>
</div>
<style>
    .hisTopic {
        text-transform: capitalize;
    }

    .scroll_div {
        width: 100%;
        height: auto;
        max-height: 300px;
        overflow-y: scroll;
    }
</style>

<script>
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$("#addHistory").click(function(){
            var cid = $(this).attr('data-id');
            var topic = $("#ddlHistoryTopic").val();
            var notes = $("#historyNotes").val();
            var date = $("#date_history").val();
            
            if(topic ==""){
                alert("Please select topic.");
                 $("#ddlHistoryTopic").focus();
                return false;
            }else if($.trim(notes) == ""){
                 alert("Please enter notes.");
                 $("#historyNotes").focus();
                return false;
            }
            else{
                $.ajax({
				url: home_url + "yogiccoach/add_history_notes",
				data: {"cid": cid,"topic": topic, "notes": notes, "date": date},
				dataType: "json",
				type: "POST",
				success: function (response) {
					if (response.status == '1') {
						$("#historyNotes").val("");
						$("#historyNotes").focus();
						$("#tbHistoryNotes").html(response.data);

					} else {
						alert(response.message);
					}
				}
			});
                
            }
            
        });
	});
</script>
<script>

function myFunction() {
  var x = document.getElementById("ddlHistoryTopic");
  var option = document.createElement("option");
  if (document.getElementById("addtopic").value != "") {
  option.text = document.getElementById("addtopic").value;
  x.add(option, x[1]);
    }else{
        alert("Please insert topic");
    }
}

function myFunctions() {
  var x = document.getElementById("History_Topic");
  var option = document.createElement("option");
  if (document.getElementById("addtopics").value != "") {
  option.text = document.getElementById("addtopics").value;
  x.add(option, x[1]);
    }else{
        alert("Please insert topic");
    }
}

$(document).on('click','.item_edit',function(){
            var topic = $(this).data('topic');
            var history_id = $(this).data('id');
            var details = $(this).data('details');
            var date = $(this).data("date");
             
            $('#Modal_Edit').modal('show');
            var x = document.getElementById("History_Topic");
            var option = document.createElement("option");
            option.text = topic;
            option.setAttribute('selected',true);
            option.setAttribute('data-id',history_id);
            x.add(option, x[1]);

            $('#history_Notes').val(details);
            $('#date_his').val(date);
            $('#btn_update').data("id",history_id);

            });
            
    //update record to database
         $('#btn_update').on('click',function(){
            var topic = $('#History_Topic').val();
            var details = $('#history_Notes').val();
            var date = $('#date_his').val();
            var history_id = $(this).data("id");
            $.ajax({
                type : "POST",
                url  : home_url + "yogiccoach/edit_history_notes",
                dataType : "JSON",
                data : {topic:topic , details:details, date:date, history_id:history_id},
                success: function(data){
                 location.reload(true);   
                }
            });
            location.reload(true);
            return false;
        });

    $(document).on('click','.item_delete',function(){
            var id = $(this).data('id');
             var result = confirm("Are you sure to delete?");
             if(result){
                $.ajax({
                type : "POST",
                url  : home_url + "yogiccoach/delete_history_notes",
                dataType : "JSON",
                data : {id:id},
                success: function(data){
                 location.reload(true);
                }
            });
                location.reload(true);
            }
        });
</script>
<?php $this->load->view('yogiccoach/footer'); ?>

Buisness Checklist and forms active



Buisness Checklist and forms active Controller

application/controllers/yogicoach.php 
public function buisness($user_id=''){

if($this->isAuthorized($user_id)){
$data = array();

$this->load->model("user_model");

$marketing_forms = $this->user_model->get_marketing_forms($user_id,'', true);
$user_marketing_forms = $this->user_model->get_marketing_forms($user_id,'', false);

$coaching_forms = $this->user_model->get_coaching_forms($user_id,'', true);
$user_coaching_forms = $this->user_model->get_coaching_forms($user_id,'', false);
$this->load->model("coach_model");
$checklist = $this->coach_model->get_checklist($user_id);
$mchecklist = $this->coach_model->get_mchecklist($user_id);


//$data['memberImages']=$this->Admin_model->get_table_records('chakra_reading',array('fld_user_id'=>$user_id));
$data['minor']=$this->Common_model->get_table_records('chakra_reading_minor',array(),"fld_id","asc");
$data['major']=$this->Common_model->get_table_records('chakra_reading_major',array(),"fld_id","asc");
$data['aura']=$this->Common_model->get_table_records('chakra_reading_aura',array(),"fld_id","asc");
$data['user_id']=$user_id;
$data['coaching_forms'] = $coaching_forms;
$data['marketing_forms'] = $marketing_forms;
$data["checklist"] = $checklist;
$data["mchecklist"] = $mchecklist;
$data["modules"] = $this->modulelist;

$this->load->view('yogiccoach/buisness',$data);
}
}
public function update_market_checklist($checklist_id='',$user_id='',$status =''){
$recID = 0;
if($checklist_id !="" && $user_id !="" && $status !=""){
//check if exists
$this->db->where(array("fld_checklist_id"=>$checklist_id, "fld_user_id"=>$user_id));
$rec = $this->db->get('market_checklist_user');

if($rec->num_rows() > 0) {//if exists
$curRow = $rec->row();
$recID = $curRow->id;
if($status == "0"){
//remove entry
$this->db->where(array("fld_checklist_id"=>$checklist_id, "fld_user_id"=>$user_id));
$this->db->delete("market_checklist_user");
}
}
else{
//insert
if($status == "1")
{
$data = array(
"fld_checklist_id"=>$checklist_id,
"fld_user_id"=>$user_id
);
$this->db->insert("market_checklist_user",$data);
$recID = $this->db->insert_id();
}
}
}
echo $recID;

}
public function update_marketing_form_status($form_id='',$user_id='',$status =''){
$recID = 0;

$coach=$this->db->get_where('mys_marketing_forms',array('id'=>$form_id));
if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
$row=$coach->row_array();

$formtitle = $row["title"];
$view_name = $row["view_name"];
}

if($form_id !="" && $user_id !="" && $status !=""){
//check if exists
$this->db->where(array("fld_form_id"=>$form_id, "fld_user_id"=>$user_id));
$rec = $this->db->get('marketing_form_user');

if($rec->num_rows() > 0) {//if exists
$curRow = $rec->row();
$recID = $curRow->id;
if($status == "1"){
//update
$this->db->where(array("fld_form_id"=>$form_id, "fld_user_id"=>$user_id));
$this->db->update("marketing_form_user",array("assign_date"=>time(),"completed_date"=>'',"last_modified" =>date('Y-m-d
H:i:s')));

/********* Get Current Login admin Data **************/
$session = $this->session->get_userdata();
$login_id=$session['user_id'];
/*echo "
<pre>";
					print_r($user_id);
					exit();*/
					$coachemail='';
					$admin=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$login_id));
					if ($admin->num_rows()>0) {
						$row=$admin->row_array();

						$adminName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
						$adminemail = $row["fld_email"];
					}
					/**************** Current Active coach data ********************/
					$coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));
					if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
						$row=$coach->row_array();

						$coachName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
						$coachStatus = $row["fld_status"];
						$coachemail = $row["fld_email"];
					}
						/*echo "<pre>";
					print_r($coachemail);
					print_r($adminemail);
					exit();*/
					
				$message = '<head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=windows-1252"><meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001"></head><body bgcolor="#ffffff"><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong><table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4"><tr><td align="center" id="TdHeader" bgcolor="#400080"><p align="center"><font color="#ffffff" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="6"><strong>Welcome</strong></font></p></td></tr></table><table width="600" align="center" id="TbBodyRow" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tr><td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff"><table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4"><tr><td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left"><font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"><strong>Hi '.$coachName.'&nbsp;<font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">&nbsp;</font></strong></font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p align="justify" style="margin-right: 0px;"><font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"> This is an auto-generated email, to notify you that your coach '.$adminName.' has activated <b>"'.$formtitle.'"</b> for you on MyportalX.<br><br>Please check out your form,in the coaching corner, on MyportalX.</font></p><br></font></font></font></p><p align="left"><br></p></td></tr></table></td></tr></table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong><table width="600" align="center" id="TbFooter" bgcolor="#eea000" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4"><tr><td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000"><div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span></div><div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Regards,</span><br style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"></span></div><div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;">Team MyportalX</span></div><div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></div></div></td></tr></table></body>';
					
					//Send mail
					$subject = 'Form Activated';   
                 $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
                 $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
                 $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
                 $retval = mail ($coachemail,$subject,$message,$header);

                 $nots=array(
            'sender_id' => $login_id,
            'reciver_id' => $user_id,
            'message' => "This is an auto-generated email, to notify you that your coach ".$adminName." has activated <b>".$formtitle,
            'urls' => $view_name,
            'fld_date' => time()
         );

         $this->db->insert('notification',$nots);
					//Send mail
					if($retval){
						echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\"><strong>Success! </strong>.<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";
						}
					else{
						$this->session->set_flashdata("email_sent","You have encountered an error");
						}

				}
				else{
					//remove entry
					$this->db->where(array("fld_form_id"=>$form_id, "fld_user_id"=>$user_id));
					$this->db->delete("marketing_form_user");
				}
			}
			else{
				//insert
				if($status  == "1")
				{
					$data = array(
							"fld_form_id"=>$form_id,
							"fld_user_id"=>$user_id,
							"assign_date"=>time(),
							"completed_date"=>'',
							"status"=>'1'
						);
					$this->db->insert("marketing_form_user",$data);
					$recID = $this->db->insert_id();

					/********* Get Current Login admin Data **************/
					$session = $this->session->get_userdata();
					$login_id=$session['user_id'];
					/*echo "<pre>";
					print_r($user_id);
					exit();*/
					$admin=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$login_id));
					if ($admin->num_rows()>0) {
						$row=$admin->row_array();

						$adminName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
						$adminemail = $row["fld_email"];
					}
					/**************** Current Active coach data ********************/
					$coach=$this->db->get_where('users',array('fld_id'=>$user_id));
					if ($coach->num_rows()>0) {
						$row=$coach->row_array();

						$coachName = $row["fld_first_name"] . " " . $row["fld_last_name"];
						$coachStatus = $row["fld_status"];
						$coachemail = $row["fld_email"];
					}
						/*echo "<pre>";
					print_r($coachemail);
					print_r($adminemail);
					exit();*/
					/***************** Send mail to member by coach *********************/
					$message = '<head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=windows-1252"><meta name="GENERATOR" content="MSHTML 11.00.10570.1001"></head><body bgcolor="#ffffff"><strong></strong><strong> </strong><strong></strong><table width="600" align="center" id="TbHeader" bgcolor="#400080" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4"><tr><td align="center" id="TdHeader" bgcolor="#400080"><p align="center"><font color="#ffffff" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="6"><strong>Welcome</strong></font></p></td></tr></table><table width="600" align="center" id="TbBodyRow" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tr><td id="TdBodyRow" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff"><table width="100%" id="TbBody" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4"><tr><td align="center" id="TdBody" bgcolor="#ffffff">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<p align="left"><font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"><strong>Hi '.$coachName.'&nbsp;<font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">&nbsp;</font></strong></font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p align="justify" style="margin-right: 0px;"><font color="#000000" face="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3"> This is an auto-generated email, to notify you that your coach '.$adminName.' has activated <b>"'.$formtitle.'"</b> for you on MyportalX.<br><br>Please check out your form,in the coaching corner, on MyportalX.</font></p><br></font></font></font></p><p align="left"><br></p></td></tr></table></td></tr></table><strong></strong><strong></strong><strong> </strong><table width="600" align="center" id="TbFooter" bgcolor="#eea000" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4"><tr><td align="center" id="TdFooter" bgcolor="#eea000"><div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-family: arial; font-size: inherit; font-style: normal; font-weight: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;"><br></span></span></div><div style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 52, 89);"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); line-height: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 52, 89); 					//Send mail
					$subject = 'Form Activated';  
                 $header = "From:" . $this->config->item('mail_from') . "\r\n";
                 $header .= "MIME-Version: 1.0\r\n";
                 $header .= "Content-type: text/html\r\n";
                 $retval = mail ($coachemail,$subject,$message,$header);

                 $nots=array(
            'sender_id' => $login_id,
            'reciver_id' => $user_id,
            'message' => "This is an auto-generated email, to notify you that your coach ".$adminName." has activated <b>".$formtitle,
            'urls' => $view_name,
            'fld_date' => time()
         );

         $this->db->insert('notification',$nots);

					//Send mail
					if($retval){
						echo "<div class=\"alert alert-success\"><strong>Success email send! </strong>.<a href=\"#\" class=\"close\" data-dismiss=\"alert\" aria-label=\"close\">&times;</a></div>";
						}
					else{
						$this->session->set_flashdata("email_sent","You have encountered an error");
						}
				}
			}

		}	
		
		echo $recID;
